children.text: nimbaṃ nataṃ śarkarāṃ ca dadyāt tadvat pralepanam |
surādanīṃ(?) sugandhāṃ ca dadyāt tadvat pralepanam |
āragvadhaṃ ca bhārgīṃ ca sāśvagandhāṃ gavādanīm ||
pāṭhāṃ haridre ca tathā gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojayet ||
sphoṭeṣv atha tu jāteṣu chāyāyām upaveśayet ||
candanasya ca yatsāraṃ badarāt khadirasya ca ||
taiḥ kaṣāyeiś ca kalkaiś ca siñcayel lepayec ca tam |
kharjūrasya ca bījāni śaṅkhanābhiḥ ca dāpayet ||
na ca vyādhimupekṣeta śarīraṃ patitaṃ budhaḥ |
śyāmākāś ca makuṣṭhāni caṇakāḥ kuṣṭhināṃ hitāḥ |
evaṃ hi vartamānānāṃ kuṣṭhaṃ praśamameti vai || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātyāśitīyaṃ
      vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
mātrāgurus tathaiva syād dravyataś ca tathā guruḥ ||
tatra yo mātrayā bhuṅkte dravyaṃ gurvapi mānavaḥ |
śālyādīny api yo ' tyarthamaśnāti sulaghūny api |
dravyasya laghuno yuktyā sauhity aṃ yo ' dhigacchati |
laghu vāpi samāsādya dravyaṃ yo hy atisevate |
evam eva ca bhojyena pathyenāpyāyate naraḥ |
yathā hy akālavṛṣṭyā ca bhūmau bījaṃ vipadyate |
vardhate kālavṛṣṭyā ca dehino ' pi tathā rasaiḥ ||
yac cānyatkaṭukaṃ pāke bhojyaṃ tan nityam ācaret ||
pādābhyāṃ na caretkṛṣṭe viṣame kaṇṭakeṣu ca |
gahanaṃ paradārāṃś ca nadīḥ pūrṇāś ca na vrajet ||
janavādāṃś ca śauṇḍāṃś ca dviṣataś cāpi mānavān |
sarīsṛpāṃś caiva kṣudrapādāṃś ca na spṛśet |
mahiṣān gavayān khaḍgān vyāghrān siṃhāṃś ca varjayet ||
na gavāṃ pratilomaṃ ca na madhye
ghṛtamuṣṇāmbu ca bhajedetadārogyam uttamam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || atha na vegāndhāraṇīyaṃ
vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
na vātasya na pittasya na śuklasya kaphasya ca ||
na bāṣpasya na nidrādeḥ prāptaṃ vegaṃ vidhārayet ||
kupyanti retasaś cāpi śarkarā sāśmarī tathā ||
tvagdoṣo vā jvaro vā syāt gātre
śauryasya ca tathā vidvān prāptaṃ vegaṃ vidhārayet ||
etaddhārayato hy asya balamāyuś ca vardhate |

dhavaṃ palāśaw nyagrodhaw naktamālamathāpi vā || śirīṣaṃ
      karavīraṃ ca jātivṛkṣamathārjunam ||
tadasya śodhayed vaktraṃ pittasya ca kaphasya ca |
svaktaḥ sūtsāditaś caiva praghṛṣṭaś ca yathābalam |
haridrāṃ ca sugandhāṃ ca saralāṃ devadāru ca ||
vaktraṃ ca sarpiṣāktaṃ syād dhūmametaṃ tataḥ pibet ||
sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ gajadantasya vā punaḥ |
balaṃ dadāti dṛṣṭeś ca samyagdhūmo niṣevitaḥ ||
śiroviśuddhiṃ kurute bhuktaṃ ca sthāpayaty api ||
pūrvaṃ pītodako bhuktvā labhate kṛśatāṃ naraḥ |
bhuktavānatha pānīyaṃ paścād anupibec ca yaḥ |
agnau pratāpayet pāṇī syātāṃ yāvat tu nirjalau |
na rātrau dadhi bhuñjīta nāghṛtaṃ nāpy amākṣikam |
kuṣṭhau patepi vāṃchaṃ kiṃ kaṇṭharogāc ca buddhimān(?) ||
sopānatkas tathā daṇḍī chatreṇa vyajanena ca |

vāto hi śūlaṃ vihataḥ karoti mūtrapradoṣaṃ janayec ca
      mūtram |
kāsaḥ pratiśyāyamatho kṣayaṃ ca śvāsaṃ ca kuryād vihate tu vege ||

purīṣamānāhamatīva kuryād reto ' varodhaḥ kurute ' tha
      ṣāṇḍyam |

tasmād dhi vegaṃ na vidhārayeta naro ya icchediha dīrghamāyuḥ || ity āha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
      indriyopakramaṇīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
tasmāt sarvatra vayasi yathākālaṃ striyaṃ vrajet ||
vā bhukto na kliṣṭo ' pyāvilo na ca ||
kṛśo nātyaśito vāpi dīno vā maithunaṃ vrajet |
pakṣādvasante grīṣme tu māsi māsi samācaret |
nidāghe paścime māse maithunaṃ caiva varjayet ||
hṛṣṭāḥ sarvatra kāle a śaktyardhena vrajetstriyaḥ ||
oṣadhīś ca maṇīṃś caiva maṅgalyān dhārayetsadā |
sa me mādyāpagāddehādvāyuḥ prāṇāś ca ye sadā |
indro me balamādadyād śivaṃ cāpo diśantu naḥ ||
ity evaṃ mantramārṣaṃ vai bhuktvā gatvāt havā striyaḥ |
saṃjapanvai spṛśan vāri tathā ' syāyurna hīyate || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto mātrāśitīyaṃ
      vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
prasidhyati sa dhūmena kaphaś cāpaiti cakṣuṣaḥ ||
yac ca kiṃcidviceṣṭābhir atyarthaṃ kurute naraḥ |
svapnāntasandhyayoś cāpi na khādenna ca saṃviśet |
vairiṇo nopaseveta bāhubhyāṃ na nadīṃ taret |
hastyaśvagāś ca sarpaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet ||
pariṇāme ca bhaktasya khādec cāpi vibhītakam ||
mūtramapsu na kurvīta purīṣaṃ ca kadācana |
rājāpathyacarā ye vai ye ca taddrohiṇo narāḥ |
sadbhir ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ vṛttamātreyasammatam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaś
      catuṣpādabhiṣagjitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
praṇaśyati yathā vṛṣṭaṃ tathā duryojitāḥ kriyāḥ ||
iṣvāsas tu yathā yukto dharmātmā khaḍgapāṇidhṛt |
durvarṇo durbalaś ca syād vyādhibhiś cāpy upadrutaḥ |
na sā siddhirasiddhiḥ syādyāṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhipadyate |
tasmāt jñānavatāṃ siddhiṃ vindeta matimān bhiṣak ||
tatra prathamataḥ pādamauṣadhaṃ tu nibodha me |
auṣṇyamagnerapāṃ śaity aṃ kharatvaṃ pārthivo guṇaḥ |
sauṣiryaṃ lāghavaṃ yatra bhaiṣajyaṃ cāpi khātmakam ||
kharatvaṃ ca vivekaś ca raukṣyaṃ cāpy anilātmakam |
snehaḥ kledaś ca śaity aṃ ca mṛdutvaṃ cāpi vārijam ||

paicchilyaṃ gauravaṃ mūrtisthairyaṃ gandhaś ca pārthivam
      |
suṣiraṃ nātiviṣṭaṃ ca tiryagyātaṃ ca garhitam ||
bheṣajaṃ prathamaḥ pādaḥ iti jñeyaṃ cikitsite ||
lakṣaṇaś cātmavāṃś caiva kṛtajñassumanāś ca yaḥ ||
dṛḍhabhakto ' nasūyaś ca yaś cāpi na viṣīdati ||
bheṣajaṃ ca pratiśrāvī bhiṣagātura eva ca ||

vidyāt tasmāc cikitsāyāṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhiṣak || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      iti bhele navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta āmapradoṣīyaṃ
      vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
udveṣṭyante ' sya gātrāṇi kaṭipṛṣṭhaṃ ca dūyate ||
śiro guru bhavatyasya tathā netre śarīriṇaḥ ||
manye ca paridahyete śraddhā cāsya na jāyate |
yadāsya vāyuḥ pittaṃ ca śleṣmā cāpi samudgataḥ ||
kaphapitte kṣayaṃ prāpte vāte hi kila mūrcchite |
śuddhakoṣṭhe hṛte doṣe śūnyakāye ca mārutaḥ ||
madhuraḥ pūrvamudgāro madhye cāmlo yadā bhavet ||
lāghavaṃ vīkṣyate kāye viśuddhaṃ viśadaṃ mukham ||
praguṇaṃ kurute vātamūrdhvaṃ vā yadi vāpy adhaḥ |
mustaṃ hiṅgu trikaṭukaṃ pāṭhā vatsā harītakī ||

gomūtrapiṣṭāssaguḍāḥ phalavartiḥ praśasyate || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      iti bhele daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ ||

athātassamaśayanaparighanīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |
rasādraktaṃ tato māṃsaṃ māṃsānmedastato ' sthi ca |
asthno majjā tataḥ śuklaṃ śuklād garbhasya saṃbhavaḥ ||
yasmin vyāpadyate dhātau tasmin vyādhīn karotyatha |
vipāṭikāṃś ca tān vyādhīn rasavyāpattijān viduḥ |
vidāhaṃ ca madaṃ caiva sonmādaṃ cāpatānakam ||
narasya strīsvaratvaṃ vā strī vāpi puruṣasvarā ||

viruddhāśanavarjī syādetadārogyam uttamam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ iti
      bhele ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      ātreyakhaṇḍakāpyīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

ātreyaḥ khaṇḍakāpyaś ca maitreyo ' nye ca tadvidhāḥ
      |
taṃ matsyaṃ varjayed ekaṃ dugdhenānyāṃs tu bhakṣayet |

bādhiryaṃ vā ' pyathāndhyaṃ vā mṛtyuṃ vā bhakṣayan
      vrajet |
kapotān sarṣapairbhṛṣṭān payasā na tu bhakṣayet ||
krimijā vyādhayaś cāsya dṛśyante yadi jīvati |
iha yā strī pumāṃś caiva hitajīrṇamitāśanau ||
balavān varṇavāṃś caiva cakṣuṣmāṃś ca bhavatyatha ||
ajīrṇe tvaśanaṃ yasya jīrṇe cānaśanaṃ bhavet ||
sa tathobhayathā rogān dāruṇān prāpyān naraḥ |
tasmājjīrṇe ca pathyāś ca mātrāvanto ' virodhinaḥ |

yuktyā saṃvṛtadhātubhiḥ || ity āha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

|trayodaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto janapadavibhaktīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
kasmin janapade rogāḥ ke bhavantyadhikā iti |
meghe ' varṣati varṣāsu hemante yatra varṣati |
tathā batālikā nāma piṭakā cāsya jāyate ||
kaṇṭhe vā śrotramāśrity a vastau vā hṛdaye ' pi vā ||
ity etatsamyaguddiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ yadyac ca coditam |

ṛṣibhyaḥ paripṛcchadbhyaḥ praśnajātaṃ yathākramam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      |

iti bhele trayodaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturdaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      cikitsāprābhṛtīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
atimātraṃ hi bhaiṣajyaṃ jīvaṃ harati dehinām |
yathā vṛkṣasya puṣpeṣu palāśeṣu phaleṣu ca |
yathā mūle tarośchanne mlāyatyagraṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
madhu seveta varṣāsu sarpiḥ śaradi cācaret ||
mārdvīkaṃ tu vasante vai nidāghe kṣīramācaret ||

iti bhele caturdaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
      athātastisraiṣaṇīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
śarīre ca balaṃ caiva malaṃ tebhyaḥ prajāyate ||
malaṃ tu rogo bhavati vaiṣamyaṃ dhātubhir gataiḥ |
malāc cāpy eti vaiṣamyaṃ tasmāt tamabhinirharet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele pañcadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣoḍaśo ' dhyāyaḥ ||

athāto
      vātakalākalīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
yāvattiṣṭhati vāto hi dehī tāvat tu jīvati ||
sa hi garbhāśaye śuklaṃ visraṃsayati yoṣitaḥ |
vātaḥ striyā rajo hanti vandhyā bhavati tena sā ||
vātāddhi kubjāḥ kuṇinaḥ khaṃjā gṛdhrasinas tathā ||
sthitiḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ caiva saritāṃ caiva niḥsvanāḥ ||
vidyutāṃ ca balaṃ caiva vātādeva pravartate |
yonyāṃ retaḥ prasiktaṃ ca vāyunā yujyate guṇaiḥ |
eṣa pittaṃ kaphaṃ caiva hanyādanyataraṃ tayoḥ ||
evaṃ vyānamudānaṃ ca samānaṃ ca pracakṣate ||
samāno dhāraṇaś caiva saṃgṛhṇāti sa dehinām ||
indriyāṇi manaś caiva bhūtātmānaṃ ca sammataḥ |
viśeṣas tv aparo vāyurapāna iti saṃjñitaḥ ||
śoṣaṇaś caraṇaś caiva tathā vicaraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ |
prāṇaḥ prīṇāti bhūtāni prāṇo jīva iti smṛtaḥ ||

|saptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto daśaprāṇāyatanīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iha dvau bhiṣajau vidyāt jñaś caivājñaś ca dehinām |
tatra jñaḥ sūtravānyaḥ syāt sūtrārthena vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
siddhayo dvādaśa proktās tathā kalpendriyāṇi ca |
anyadevaṃvidhaṃ yac ca śāstre kiṃcidapi śrutam |
yo ' nnakāle yavāgūṃ tu sūpakāle tathā rasam |
yūṣakāle ' tha māṃsaṃ tu śodhyeṣu stambhanāni ca ||
yo ' nyadvā kurute so ' jña ucyate ||

yathā tamasi dīpaḥ syāt tatrarahā śāstraṃ prakāśakṛt || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele saptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto '
      nnarakṣīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

cāstrebhyo na bhṛtyebhyo ' sti me
      bhayam |
anyatra viṣayogebhyaḥ so ' tra me śaraṇaṃ bhavān ||
duṣṭāni rūpāṇi tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu ||
śuklaṃ bhavati yatkṣipraṃ nainaṃ śliṣyanti makṣikāḥ ||
mālyaṃ tu śyāvapuṣpaṃ syānmlānaṃ kālaṃ ca dṛśyate |
vedanāṃ caiva kaṇḍūṃ ca kurute duṣṭamañjanam
paridāhaś ca bhedaś ca gandhajñānamasādhu ca ||
na samyagvetti ca rasānaraṇīva ca mathyate |
iti dhūmasya rūpāṇi sarvāṇy etāni lakṣayet ||
duṣṭe vāsasi liṅgāni sūcībhir iva tudyate |
sudine durdine cāpi durdine sudinaṃ tathā |
śiśire muñcati svedaṃ grīṣme śītāturo bhavet ||
syandanau ca vivarṇau ca paruṣau daśanacchadau ||
upānahau yadā duṣṭau tadā kaṇḍūḥ prajāyate |
kampate cāpi kaṇṭho ' sya niḥsvanaṃ ṣṭhīvate muhuḥ ||
keśāntaṃ śīryate cāsya nakhāḥ śyāmībhavanti ca |
hriyā yuktaḥ kulīnaś ca dharmajño dīrghadarśanaḥ ||
yā proktā viṣapraśamane hitā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele ' ṣṭādaśodhyāyaḥ || || ekonaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      vidhiśoṇitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
yas tu tadbhajate yuktyā na taṃ vyādhiḥ
na naktaṃ tu, pibedyuktyā pānaṃ tasmād vicakṣaṇaḥ |
kṣāre ca lavaṇe caiva na surā prātiṣidhyate ||
tāṃ tu rūkṣāṃ viśeṣeṇa nātimātraṃ samācaret ||
yuktāṃ prasannāṃ pibataḥ sa kṣipram upaśāmyati ||
vastiḥ śuddhyati pānena śarkarā cāpi bhidyate |
tejo balaṃ ca harṣaś ca yuktyā pānena vardhate ||
tasmāt pānaguṇān buddhvā yathāyogaṃ samācaret || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele ekonaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || viṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto '
      rthedaśamūlīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
artha ity āha hṛdayaṃ tasmin dhamanayo daśa |
ūrdhvaṃ catasro dve tiryak catasraś cāpy adhaḥ kramāt ||
hṛdi prāṇāś ca cakrasthāḥ vimāne karṇikā yathā |
marmābhighātaṃ tenātra sahate hṛdaye na tu ||
etayor eva varṇaṃ ca vibharti hṛdayaṃ nṛṇām ||
hṛttathā saṃvṛtaṃ svapne vivṛtaṃ jāgrataḥ smṛtam ||
sūryāṃśaṃ dhūmam ity āhuryato ' bhraprabhavaḥ smṛtaḥ |
abhrādvarṣaṃ tato ' nnāni, tasmāt tejo mahatparam ||
svedaś cāsraṃ ca mūtraṃ ca phenaṃ cāmyantaraṃ malam |
rūkṣastambhyān pramehāṃś ca kapharogāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ ||
hṛdroge caiva kuṣṭhe ca sarvaśleṣmāmayeṣu ca ||
dāhaṃ vicarcikāṃ caiva vātavyādhīṃś ca sarvaśaḥ ||
āsthāpayed dhi gulmāṃś ca mūtrāghātodarāṇi ca |
apasmārāṃś ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca vātavyādhīṃś ca sarvaśaḥ ||
stambhayed raktapittaṃ ca visarpaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ |
dāhaṃ visphoṭakāṃś caiva pittavyādhīṃś ca sarvaśaḥ ||
virecayed virecyāṃs tu tathā pakvāśayāśrayān || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele ekaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ svedādhyāyaṃ
      vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
marutaś cāprasiddhiś ca na tatsvinnasya lakṣaṇam ||
asvinne snehanaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ svedair upācaret
athavā śītalair vātha kṣīraiḥ siṃced ghṛtena vā ||
pipāsuṃ vā na śaktaṃ ca garbhiṇīṃ kukṣirogiṇīm |
saṅkaras tv eṣa vijñeyaḥ svedānāmagrya ucyate ||
taptaiḥ pātrayutair vāpi śuddhair vā salilairbhiṣak ||
sthālyau tapte kuṭiś cāpi yadā tenoṣmaṇā tadā ||
svedyās tu vātakaphajā vātajāḥ kaphajās tathā ||

svedyās tu snigdharūkṣābhyāṃ jñātvā vyādhibalābalam || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele dvāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || trayoviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      gāḍhapurīṣīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
pārśve śroṇyāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe ca hṛdaye cāvatiṣṭhate ||
śiraś cāpy avasaṃgṛhya vikārān kurute bahūn |
tato jvaro ' sya balavān pāṇḍutvaṃ cāpi jāyate |
śvayathuś ca bhaved asya grahaṇī ca praduṣyati ||
atha yaḥ kalilaś ca syāt prajākāmaś ca mānavaḥ |
atha sthūlakṛśaś caiva vaidyamāni ca yo bhavet |
sabhaṃgān sukumārāṃś ca garbhiṇīṃ taruṇi tadā |
durdilāṃś ca yadu prāptān kāsinaḥ sāti nāriṇaḥ ||
pāṇḍurājaiva karṇaṃ ca satataṃ yaś ca kāsati |
pāyayec ca bhiṣaktāpairvamanaṃ savirecanam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      ṛtuvibhāgīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
yāti naikāntataḥ siddhiṃ tasmāt svasthaṃ na payayet ||
vāte tu bṛṃhaṇaṃ kuryāt pitte tu pariśodhanam |
vātātapaviśuṣkāś ca ye ca karmaparā narāḥ |
atyaśnano ' tipibataḥ sadā ca svapato divā |
doṣā ghorāḥ prakupyanti teṣāṃ sādhu virecanam ||
yathā hy annamakāle syādviṣaṃ kāle ' mṛtaṃ bhavet |
varṣāsu cāpy anyathā ca durdine cāpy ato ' nyathā ||
tasmiṃstasmiṃś ca kāle vai bhavetkāryo ' nyathānyathā |
atha grīṣme tu santaptairdhātubhir dehino bhavet ||
bhramaḥ klamaḥ pramohaś ca mado mūrcchā vikampanam ||
aruṣāṃ vivṛtānāṃ vā sphoṭānāṃ vā prapācanam ||
raktasthānagate vidyāt pitte vaivarṇyam eva ca |
dūyadbhir vikalaiś cāpi jñeyās tv ekāṅgarogiṇaḥ ||

bhūyas tv idam adhiṣṭhānaṃ pratirogaṃ pratīkṣata || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaḍviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      aṣṭodarīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
granthīṃś ca pañca pañcaiva kuṣṭhānyaṣṭau vinirdiśet ||
dvau dvau tisras tu vidradhyas tv alajyaḥ śoṇitāni ca ||
kācaṃ ca liṅganāśaṃ ca timirāṇi ca nirdiśet ||
vātaḥ pittaṃ kapho vāpi yasya śīrṣaṃ vidhāvati |
vātajaṃ pittajaṃ caiva śleṣmajaṃ māṃsajaṃ tathā |
pūyānmūtrāc ca śuklāc ca sandhānāc cāpi dehinām |
parisarpā visarpāś ca gātrajā netrajās tathā |
romadā rohitāś caiva kaṣṭā dāruṇakās tathā ||
yathā patatriḥ śīghro ' pi svāṃ chāyāṃ nātivartate |
vātādernātivartante bahavo ' pi tathā++āmayāḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

|saptaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto ' nnapānavidhīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
pācayati kṣāraḥ kṣīraṃ vai jīvayaty api ||
snehayatyatha sarpiś ca piśitaṃ bṛṃhayaty api |
māṣā bahumalāś cāpi ślīpadaṃ janayed dadhi ||
tvacaṃ prasādayet tailaṃ snehanāya ca kalpate |
piṇyākaḥ kurute glāniṃ takraṃ ca kṣapayaty api ||
madhu cāpy atha sandhatte jarjarīkurute surā |
hareṇubhir masūraiś ca bhṛśaṃ vāyuḥ prakupyati ||
nātiśleṣmakaraṃ hiṅgu ṣaṇḍyaṃ kṣāraḥ karoti ca |
surasaṃ sumukhaṃ caiva caṭakaṃ ca phaṇijjakam |
rasena kaṭukaṃ vidyāt vipāke madhuraṃ tathā ||
rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tadvidyād vividhaṃ ca yat ||
rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tad vidyāt trividhaṃ ca yat ||
priyaṅguś ca plāṅgaś ca balākāś ca khagās tathā ||
ye cānye ' pyaudakā bhaumyāḥ khecarāś ca khagāḥ smṛtāḥ |
rasena madhuraṃ tadvai vipāke kaṭukaṃ viduḥ |
mudgān masūrāṃś caṇakān kulutthāṃś ca kalāyakān ||
dadhi cukraṃ ca dhānyānām anupānaṃ pradāpayet |

sātmyatāṃ ca prayacchati || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele saptaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      bhojanavidhīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
yad bhakṣayati bhuṅkte vā vidhivac cāpi mānavaḥ |
anyac ca kiñcit pibati tat sarvaṃ ṣaḍrasānvitam ||
rasato vīryataś caiva pravakṣyāmy ata uttaram ||
śālayo madhurāḥ sarve vipāke kaṭukāḥ smṛtāḥ |
kaṣāyas tv adhikaḥ kiṃcit ṣaṣṭikāḥ śālibhiḥ samāḥ |
vīryoṣṇā madhurāste vai sakaṣāyāś ca kīrtitāḥ ||
gavaś ca śyāmākāś ca samā rasaiḥ ||
tu sevitāste vai kopayanty āśu mārutān ||
yavās tv atiyavāś caiva godhūmāś ca samā rase |
kaphaṃ pittaṃ ca medaś ca kopayantyatisevitāḥ ||
makuṣṭhakāś ca te ' pyuktāḥ kaṣāyā madhurā rase ||
hareṇavo masūrāś ca satīnāś ca tathāḍhakī |
śvadaṃṣṭrā yāvanālaś ca dvau kṣārau śītalau(?) smṛtau |
navanītaṃ tathāmlaṃ tu ghṛtaṃ vai madhuraṃ smṛtam |
rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tailaṃ sarvaṃ prakīrtītam |
tailāni rasato vidyāt tiktāni madhurāṇi ca ||
yasminyasminviśeṣas tu yo yastaṃ me nibodhata ||
sarvaṃ tu śākaṃ madhuraṃ rasato ' tha vipākataḥ |
vetrāgraṃ tiktakaṃ nimbaṃ tilaśākaṃ ca śītikā |
kaṭuko dīpanīyaś ca viṣahā svastiko rase |
bhārṅgī māṣaś ca madhurau rasataḥ parikīrtitau |
mudgaśākaṃ satiktaṃ tu sakṣāraś caiva vāstukaḥ ||
hastimāṃsaṃ ca madhuramuṣṭraṃ guru ca nirdiśet ||
ṛśyaś ca mṛgamātā ca tuṅgaś ca hariṇī mṛgaḥ |

|| iti bhele
      aṣṭāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ sūtrasthānaṃ samāptam ||
      nidānasthānam
svaraḥ sīdati cāpy asya niṣṭhīvati saśoṇitam ||
sa yadā gurumadhye vāpy athavā rājasaṃsadi |
goṣṭhe strīdyūtamadhye vā hastipṛṣṭhe ' thavā rathe ||
prāptapātaṃ purīṣaṃ vā mūtraṃ vāpi ruṇaddhi yaḥ ||
gulmajanmanimittaś ca jvaraḥ kāsaś ca jāyate |
ity ebhir lakṣaṇair vidyāt sandhāraṇakṛtaṃ kṣayam ||
tasmād ātmārthameveha prāptaṃ vegaṃ na dhārayet ||
tasya vātābhibhūtasya jvaraḥ kāsaś ca jāyate |
svaraḥ sīdati cāpy asya niṣṭhīvati saśoṇitam ||
ratimūlaṃ śarīraṃ hi śarīrasya ratiḥ phalam |
tasmāt phalārthī mūlārthaṃ striyaḥ seveta yuktitaḥ ||
sa yadā durbalo jantuḥ sevate viṣamāśanam |
rase nivṛtte tasyātha jvaraḥ kāsaś ca jāyate |

cārogyamāyattamidamuktaṃ maharṣiṇā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      |

iti bhele nidāne dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      gulmanidānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
dhāvati plavate vāpi rātrau jāgarti vā punaḥ ||
sa sakṛdbhavati sthūlaḥ punar bhavati vāpy aṇuḥ ||
punaś ca dṛśyate vyaktaṃ punarnaśyati cāpy atha |
pārśvayor hṛdi kukṣau vā gulmaṃ sañjanayatyatha |

nityaṃ taptaś ca raktaṃ ca svedaṃ
      muñcatyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ
tṛṣṇāṃ mūrcchāṃ ca janayetsthānād api visarpati |
vedanā paramā caiva tasmin sthāne prajāyate ||
cyavante na ca jāyante yāvadvyādhirna śāmyati ||
pārśvayor hṛdi kukṣau vā gulmaṃ sañjanayatyatha |
śleṣmaṇā saha bhuktaṃ ca muhurūrdhvaṃ prapadyate |
tasya sannicitā doṣā gulmaṃ kurvanti dāruṇam ||
atha lohitagulmas tu strīṇām eva prajāyate ||
nāsau bhavati nṝṇāṃ tu tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam |
sā śoṇite sthite nārī garbhiṇī strīti manyate |
koṣṭhe gulmodaraṃ tac ca garbho ' yam iti manyate |
garbho ' yam iti ca vyādhirvarṣamekaṃ bahūny api ||
eṣāṃ tu khalu pañcānāṃ gulmānāṃ samudāhṛtam |

iti bhele nidāne tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      kāsanidānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
tasya vātaḥ prakupito gṛhītvā hṛdayaṃ tataḥ |
uro ' bhighātātpārśve ca gṛhyete iva dehinaḥ |
tasya pittaṃ prakupitaṃ gṛhītvā hṛdayaṃ tataḥ |
niṣṭhīvati sapittaṃ ca raktaṃ vā nā kadācana |
mukhaṃ bhavati vā pītaṃ pittakāsena dehinaḥ ||
yassadā śleṣmalo jantuḥ śleṣmalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
tasya śleṣmā prakupito gṛhītvā hṛdayaṃ tataḥ ||
strīṣu saktaś ca yo jantus tasya śuklaparikṣayāt ||
sarva ete samuddiṣṭāḥ kāsā lakṣaṇato mayā |
tānavekṣya bhiṣag buddhyā tataḥ kuryāc cikitsitam

iti bhele nidāne caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      kuṣṭhanidānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
anullikhya vidagdhaṃ ca vidāhi ca samaśnataḥ |
yassadā śleṣmalo jantuḥ śleṣmalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
sevate ca divāsvapnaṃ tasya śleṣmā pravardhate ||
utsādyate tvagdoṣeṇa svidyate tena cāpy atha ||
maṇḍalāni ca citrāṇi teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
tadāsya kīlaṃ koṣaṃ ca picchilaṃ saṃsravanti ca ||
tvagutthāni tu rūksāṇi maṇḍalāni tanūny api ||
sidhmakuṣṭhāni jānīyāt tathā tāni bhavanti vai |
utsādyate tvagdoṣeṇa svidyate tena cāpy atha ||
yassadā pittalo jantuḥ pittalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
vātātapau sevate ca tasya pittaṃ prakupyati ||
utsādyate tvagdoṣeṇa svidyate tena cāpy atha ||
pittasya parikope vā teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
prāpnuvanti yadā bhedaṃ kuṣṭhāny audumbarāṇi ca |
maṇḍalīkāni kuṣṭhāni tadā tāni bhavanti vai ||
prāpnuvanti yadā bhedaṃ puṇḍarīkāṇi yāni vai |
tanniśamyeha matimān hitajīrṇāśano bhavet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele nidāne pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      pramehanidānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
jñeyaḥ prameho dvividhas tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
gavyājaurabhramāṃsaiś ca sadyo dadhnā ghṛtena vā ||
dehaṃ ca vastiṃ ca kledayaty api ||
yassadā medasā klinnaḥ śleṣmalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
tasya prakupitaḥ śleṣmā pramehān kurute daśa ||
tad yathodakamehaṃ ca piṣṭamehaṃ tathaiva ca |
mūtraṃ śuklopamaṃ cāpi śuklamehī tu mehati ||

pramehati tathā jantussurāmehī surākṛti || mūtraṃ sāndraṃ prasannaṃ tu
      dṛśyate

iti bhele nidāne ṣaṣṭho '
      dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
yassadā śleṣmalo jantuḥ śleṣmalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
sevate ca divāsvapnaṃ tasya śleṣmā pravardhate ||
sa vṛddha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād gṛhītvā dhamanīrdaśa |
ruddhvā cetovahaṃ mārgaṃ saṃjñāṃ bhraṃśayate tataḥ ||
yas tv etat sarvamaśnāti yathoktaṃ doṣakopanam |
sa yadā dhananāśena maraṇena priyasya vā |
atha cintayate, tasya saṃjñā bhraśyati cintayā ||
na hi satvāni hiṃsanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ |
na jātu dāruṇān rogānunmādān prāpnuyān naraḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele nidāne saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto '
      pasmāranidānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
vyāyāmaṃ sevate cāpi tasya vātaḥ prakupyati ||
sa vṛddha ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayād gṛhītvā dhamanīrdaśa |
ruddhvā cetovahaṃ mārgaṃ saṃjñāṃ bhraṃśayate tataḥ ||
sa cetpratyāgato brūyāt tamasaḥ parato gataḥ |
pratibhāti ca me kṛṣṇā jagatī khaṇḍaśas tathā ||
yassadā pittalo jantuḥ pittalaṃ bhajate ' śanam |
agnyātapau sevate ca tasya pittaṃ pravardhate ||
ruddhvā cetovahaṃ mārgaṃ saṃjñāṃ bhraṃśayate tataḥ ||
sa cetpratyāgato brūyāt tamasaḥ parato gataḥ |
pratibhāti ca me śuklā jagatī khaṇḍaśas tathā ||
yas tv etat sarvamaśnāti yathoktaṃ doṣakopanam |
ity aṣṭau vai pradiṣṭāni nidānāni śarīriṇām |
vimānāni pravakṣyāmi yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ nidānasthānaṃ samāptam ||
      || vimānasthānam || |

|prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto rasavimānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |
ato ' nyathā vikārāṃs tu janayanti śarīriṇām ||
śītaḥ snigdho gururbalyaḥ picchilo madhuro rasaḥ |
śleṣmā tu madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ śīto mandaḥ sthiro guruḥ ||
madhuraṃ lavaṇāmlau ca vidyāt kaphasamān rasān ||
tasmād abhyasyamānais taiḥ śleṣmā dehe pravardhate |
mārutaḥ snigdhabhāvaiś ca tato ' nyair upaśāmyati |
snigdhaḥ snigdhaiḥ kaphaś cāpi vardhate madhurādibhiḥ ||
śītatvānmadhuratvāc ca na pittaṃ saha sarpiṣā |
na śleṣmā madhunā sārdhaṃ dehe paryavatiṣṭhate |
ānūpamāṃsajā vāpi vasā majjāna eva ca ||
śākādaviṣkirāṇāṃ ca rasā majjāna eva ca ||
mātrāvaduṣṇaṃ snigdhaṃ ca sātmyaṃ svādu ca bhojanam ||
avidāhi ca yat pāke jīrṇe tadupayojayet |
vidahyate na mātrā ca sātmyatāṃ ca karotyatha |
na jalpanna hasaṃś cāpi na drutaṃ na vilambitam ||
jīvayanti paraṃ varṣā hemantaḥ pāyayaty api ||
grīṣmaḥ pacati cāpy enaṃ pariṇāma ivāparaḥ |
bhuñjānasyāpi cānnāni balaṃ varṇaś ca hīyate ||
alpaṃ laghvapi yaccānnaṃ bhuktaṃ duḥkhena jīryati |
nāpnoti balavarṇau ca durbalāgniḥ sa ucyate ||
guru vā laghu vā yasya viṣamāgniḥ sa ucyate ||
vātiko viṣamāgniśca, mandāgniś ca kaphān naraḥ ||
yasya hīnādhikas tv agniḥ kṣipraṃ dehaṃ sa muñcati |
guḍaṃ ca tailasammiśraṃ kuryād anyac ca taddhitam ||
vātajeṣu vikāreṣu yadā vā tairna śāmyati ||
tasya snigdhasya vamanaṃ śirasaś ca virecanam |
balaṃ vayaḥ śarīraṃ ca pratyekaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam |
āhāraś ca vihāraś ca sevyamānau krameṇa tu |
kālena prakṛtiṃ yātas tad āhuḥ sātmyalakṣaṇam ||

ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ | iti bhele vimāne tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho '
      dhyāyaḥ || athāto rogaprakṛtiviniścayaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |
pūrvaṃ tu rogavijñānaṃ tataḥ paś cāccikitsitam ||
dṛṣṭvā bhiṣak parīkṣeta prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtaṃ tathā ||
jvarasya sāmyaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ gātraṃ vā ślakṣṇakarkaśam |
dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvāvagaccheddhi śaity amauṣṇyaṃ ca pāṇinā ||
prakṛtiṃ janmadeśaṃ ca bhojanaṃ ca yathocitam ||
rūkṣāsaho naro yas tu sa vātaprakṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ |
prakṛtiṃ vai vijānīyāt tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
avyaktaṃ ca mahāṃś caiva mahābhūtāni pañca ca |
parāḥ prakṛtayassapta svabhāvaḥ kāla eva ca ||
tebhyo bhavanti bhūtāni tānyeva pratiyānti ca |
indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca buddhayaḥ pañca tās tathā ||
tadvidhenaiva śuklena yadā yogam upaiti vai ||
svapneṣu coṣṭreṇāyāti viyaty api tu gacchati |
cirādāvāti ca snātaḥ svapne paśyati codakam ||
yas tu rūkṣaṃ tu sahate sa śleṣmaprakṛtirnaraḥ |
sannipātātmikā yā tu jaghanyā sā prakīrtitā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      vyādhitarūpīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
laghuvyādhiḥ naras tv anyaḥ sattvād ibhir ananvitaḥ ||
tṛṣṇā santatabhāvaś ca bhavanty etāni tasya tu |
bhallātakaṃ vayasthā ca citrakaḥ suradāru ca |

|| ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
      ṛtuvimānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca gacchanti yathāsvaṃ dhātavo nṛṇām ||
paṭolāni ca takraṃ ca jāṅgalāṃś ca rasān laghūn |

hrasvaikapakṣo vitato yas tu garbhas tu susvaraḥ |
dvitīye māsi saṃprāpte mriyate garbha īdṛśaḥ ||
tṛtīye māsi saṃprāpte mriyate garbha īdṛśaḥ ||
trikekaro ghaṭaśirā yas tu garbhas tu susvaraḥ |
aṣṭāviṃśe gate varṣe sarvaṃ taṃ hanti mānavam ||
phalamasya tu vijñeyaṃ sthāpanaṃ na prasūyate ||
vyūṭhorasko dīrghabhujaḥ sthūlajānuś ca yo bhavet |
puraś ca paś cāc ca ṛjukaṃ priyavādinam |
lalāṭaṃ nāsikā karṇau yasyaitāni pṛthak pṛthak |
mahāntau vipulau karṇau bhavetāṃ romaśau tathā |
snigdhau bahulakeśaś ca sa ceha śatamṛcchati ||
rasāyanopayogāc ca sa dīrghamanujīvati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
mukhaṃ netre śarīraṃ ca pāṇipādaṃ tathaiva ca |
saraktaṃ dṛśyate yasya sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati || 5|
yasyaitāni tu rūpāṇi sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati ||
bhāṣate cāpi sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati ||
na vikṣipati gātrāṇi svaro ' sya na vivartate |
vastreṇa gūhate guhyaṃ sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati ||
śvasiti rātrau ca sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati ||
prasannāssuprabhāś caiva sa vai svastho bhaviṣyati || Bhṣ5.2.8? |
prajvalaty api yo dīpe tama evābhipaśyati |
tac ca lohitagandhaṃ vāpy athavā matsyagandhikam |
kṛṣṇaṃ nīlaṃ vivarṇaṃ vā mumūrṣuś ca sa hocyate ||
madhumehī vasāmehī sarpirmehī ca yo naraḥ |
bahumehī ca yo jantuḥ sa vai proktaḥ
vāyunā bhinnavastiḥ syād durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
ity etāni bhiṣak dṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇāni mumūrṣatām |
iti bhele indriye tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ ||
uttāne netraniṣyandaḥ sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam ||
na saṃsarati cānyatra sadyaḥ prāṇān jahāti saḥ ||
yasyobhe piṇḍike stabdhe nāsā jihmā ca lakṣyate |
vyāvṛtte cākṣiṇī yasya sadyaḥ prāṇān jahāti saḥ ||
tṛṣṇā ca tīvrarāgaś ca sadyaḥ prāṇān jahāti saḥ ||
atīva mukhato bhedi sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam ||
vyāhanti ca mahāsrotaḥ sadyaḥ prāṇān jahāti saḥ ||

iti bhele indriye caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      yasyaśyāvīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
yasya śyāve ume netre dṛśyete harite tathā |
utpannaś ca śirorogaḥ phalitaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
haritāś ca sirā yasya romakūpāś ca lohitāḥ |
bhuṅkte vānnāni sāmlāni tatraiva sa vinaśyati ||
gātre ca pāṇipāde ca yasya śuṣyati śoṇitam |
vṛṣaṇau pāṇipādau ca yasya śuṣkaṃ mukhaṃ tathā |
chaviś ca śoṣam āyāti paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
dṛśyate dehino yasya paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
āturas tu sa yāto vai paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
gulmaś ca madhumehaś ca dīrgharogā bhavanti te ||
dṛśyeta svarahāniś ca paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
hṛdayaṃ dahyate yasya koṣṭhe śūlaṃ svarakṣayaḥ |
abhīkṣṇaṃ dahyate cāpi paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
vāpitaṃ jvalitaṃ martyaḥ, salilaṃ hi hutāśanam |
bhāskaraṃ manyate somaṃ durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
yaś cāpi vimale sūrye meghān paśyati sarvaśaḥ |
durdinaṃ sudinaṃ cāpi paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
yaṃ rasā nāvatiṣṭhante bheṣajaṃ cendriyāṇi tu |
yasya vā viparītāni na ca jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
bhaiṣajyārthaṃ na dṛśyeta na ca jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
ity etāni bhiṣag dṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇāni mumūrṣatām |

iti bhele indriye pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      pūrvarūpīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
antarglāno bahiḥ pīno bahirādhmāta eva ca |
ninādī vā pralāpī vā hasatyatyartham eva ca |
ghanaṃ saśūlaṃ yo veda sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ naraḥ |
sukumāraś ca yo jantuḥ snehaṃ māṃsaṃ ca sevate |
divā svapiti cābhīkṣṇaṃ sa pramehī vinaśyati ||
pariśūnaś ca yo jantuḥ svede ca paruṣacchaviḥ |
yasyāgniś ca balaṃ caiva nālpaṃ bhavati dehinaḥ |
sadyo raktaṃ śiro yasya pītakaṃ vā pradṛśyate |
kapilaṃ pluṣṭakeśaṃ vā yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
jihmāni kurute vāyuryathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
śyāvā kaṇṭakinī jihvā yasya śuṣkā pradṛśyate |
śyāve netre nakhāś cāpi yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
yasyor dhvakāye balavān navo rogas tu
sauvarṇānapi vṛkṣāṃś ca yo veda sa vinaśyati ||
nopakrameta medhāvī ya icchedātmanaḥ sukham || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
      indriyāṇīkamindriyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
jale ' pi nirmale jālamajālaṃ manute naraḥ |
jāgratpaśyati yaḥ pretān rakṣāṃsi vividhāni ca |
yo ' gniṃ prakṛtivarṇasthaṃ nīlaṃ paśyati niṣprabham |
kṛṣṇaṃ vā yadi vā śuklaṃ na sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||
vidyuto vā vinā meghānna sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||
ādity amardhacandraṃ vā kṣipraṃ dṛṣṭvā vinaśyati ||
agniṃ vā niṣprabhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrau, maraṇamādiśet ||
yas tu paśyatyadṛśyaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ yas tu na paśyati |
dvāvapy etau yathā pretau tathā jñeyau vijānatā ||
viparyayeṇa yo vidyād gandhānāṃ caiva nāma tam |
na vā tat sarvato vidyād vidyāt taṃ vai gatāyuṣam ||
spṛśyān spṛṣṭvā tato ' nyac ca mumūrṣusteṣu manyate ||
naraḥ paśyati yaḥ kaścidindriyairna sa jīvati ||
paśyanti ye tu bahuśaḥ teṣāṃ maraṇamādiśet ||
maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ caiva sa bhiṣag jñātumarhati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      dūtādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
bhinatti kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhena loṣṭaṃ loṣṭhena vāpy adhaḥ |
khādedoṣṭhau ca jihvāṃ ca nakhān dantaiś ca kalpayet |
gṛdhraḥ sṛgālaḥ kākaś cāpy ulūko vāyasas tathā |
nadeyurdakṣiṇe pārśve rogiṇo yasya nāsti saḥ ||
bhagnauṣṭhaḥ kharavāṭo vā na dūtaḥ sampraśasyate ||

sa vai bhiṣak || ity āha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      gomayacūrṇaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
arundhatīṃ na paśyet tu sthitāṃ saptarṣisaṃsadi |
aṇukābhiś ca kṛṣṇābhir āsyaṃ jihvā ca tāluke |
yasya lomāni keśāś ca pluṣyantīva śarīriṇaḥ |
saṃhṛṣṭānīva vā dehī na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
niṣprabhāś cānuliptā vā na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
kṣāreṇa vidhṛtaṃ gātraṃ dṛśyate yasya dehinaḥ |
samamuṣṇe ca śīte ca na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
anabhyakteṣu gātreṣu na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
madhumehe tu yaś ca mehati mānavaḥ |
aratiś cāvipākaś ca kārśyadaurbalyam eva ca |
yasya saṃdṛśyate jantorna sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
yas tu dīnamanātho vā balena parihīyate |
saṃmūḍhavākyo bhavati yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
yas tv āsane ' tha śayane ratiṃ na labhate naraḥ |
sa śīghraṃ kurute kālaṃ yaś ca sāśrūṇi khādati ||
āruhya vānaraṃ yas tu saṃkalpaṃ nāvabudhyate |
uṣṇo vā yadi vā śīto yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
sopadravā śatapadā yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
sarvāṇi ca prabhidyante yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
nopakramettathā vīra rakṣannātmayaśaḥ sphuṭam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
      athātaśchāyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
vicchinnā yasya vā chāyā na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
dhūmāyate śiraśchāyā yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||
lākṣāraktaṃ yathā vastramevaṃ paśyati yo mahīm |
kaṇṭhaś ca śūkānugato yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||
yasya śaṅkhāccyutaṃ māṃsaṃ śyāve netre tathaiva ca |
cūrṇakaś ca mukhe jātaḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
avipakvaṃ vipakvaṃ vā bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ yathā bhavet |
ūrdhvaśvāsahato yas tu raktaṃ pracchardayen naraḥ |
śūlaṃ vā bhinnakoṣṭhasya na sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||
antardāho ' dhiko yasya śītārtiś cāpi bāhyataḥ |
ākāśaṃ paripūrṇaṃ vā vetti yo na sa jīvati ||
ucchūnaṃ yasya ca śiraḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
viriktaḥ punarādhmāti yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

jīvitaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca nṛṇāṃ vidyādbhiṣagvaraḥ || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ekadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      puṣpīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
śirasyaṅge raktavarṇaṃ yo ' nilaṃ vāpi paśyati |
aṣṭāpadaṃ vā sukṛtaṃ jagatīṃ yaḥ prapaśyati |
suptaś ca saṃvṛte gehe paśyatyākāśam eva yaḥ |
romanthayati dantaiś ca sa puṣpita ihocyate ||
sevante makṣikāś caiva puṣpitaḥ sa ihocyate ||
dakṣiṇāṃ diśamehīti yaṃ brūyānna sa jīvati ||
prakīrṇakeśo vikaraḥ svapne yo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
pratipadyeta tatraiva na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
khaṃ vā sadhūmaṃ yo vetti na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
yaḥ svapne vṛkṣamāruhya na rogī trāyate gṛhe |
gajenoṣṭreṇa vā gacchan yaḥ paśyeddakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
jīvet tu rogī saptāhaṃ, nīrogaḥ śaradāṃ śatam ||
yāti yo durdine vāpi svapne vā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
pratibudhyeta tatraiva na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
samaṃ yo taddivā yone svapne yogaphalaṃ bhavet ||
yadā gaṇḍaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca svapne cāśnaṃś ca paśyati |
prakīrṇakeśam api ca na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||
yaḥ svapne puruṣaḥ kālaṃ pītaṃ vā vastramṛcchati |
citrakaṇṭhaguṇo vāpi na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

jīvitaṃ caiva mṛtyuṃ ca nṛṇāṃ vidyādvicakṣaṇaḥ || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
      athāto+
avākcitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
avākcitā vā jihmā vā yasya chāyālpikā bhāvet |
netre ca viṣame syātāṃ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam || 5.1
yadi dīnāni pakṣmāṇi na nimīlanti dehinaḥ |
dahyete nayane vāpi paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
yasyāturasya piṭakā vyaṅgo vā dṛśyate mukhe |
aṃso ' nilāt kāsavataḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
atyuṣṇaṃ vātiśītaṃ vā stabdhaṃ vā mṛdu vāpy atha |
manyate pāṇipādaṃ ca paretaṃ tasya jībitam ||
yo ' vatīrya nadīṃ pūrṇāṃ toye paśyati jālakam |
gātraṃ liptamathādbhiś ca yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||
na svidyate lalāṭaṃ ca nāsti tasya cikitsitam ||
jvaryate kāsate vāpi tathocchavasiti vai dṛḍham |
ākramyate tāmyate ca yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||
candrastīkṣṇo mṛduścārko yasya syāt taṃ vivarjayet ||
abhaktaḥ tasimaṃ bālye yo vāti na sa jīvati ||
dviṣadbhiḥ kurute sakhyaṃ yaḥ priyairyāt i vipriyam |
akasmātkupyate yas tu paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||
yathoktaṃ veda vedāyuḥ sa bhiṣak śāstrakovidaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele indriye dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyām indriyasthānaṃ
      samāptam || |

|cikitsāsthānam || || prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta ekādaśasarpiṣkaṃ
      vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
taṃ ca nāśayatā yajñaṃ devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā |
krodhenoṣṇaṃ viniśvasya tān lokān vyāpito jvaraḥ ||
nidhane cāpi bhūtānāṃ nānyo heturvinā jvarāt ||
yāvanto ' nye samākhyātā vyādhayas tu śarīriṇām |
saṃvatsareṇa te ghnanti sadyaḥ prāṇaharo jvaraḥ ||
durlabhā buddhimantas tu tasmād vakṣyāmi vistaram |
sarpiś caikādaśaṃ vidyāt tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu |
siddhās svedāḥ kaṣāyāś ca lehaḥ pācanakāni ca ||
cūrṇaḥ pradehāssekāś ca vaṭikā modakāḥ payaḥ |
eṣāṃ prayogaṃ vakṣyāmi vīryāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak |
vāyuḥ pittena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ śleṣmā vā pittamūrcchitaḥ ||
dīpyamāne hi kāyāgnau śleṣmā vāyuś ca śāmyataḥ |
kuryād bhūyo ' gnimṛdutāṃ staimity amaruciṃ tathā ||
bhojanārthaṃ hi ṣaḍrātraṃ peyā deyā bubhukṣite |
auṣṇyādvātakaphau hanyāt llaghutvāt param eva ca |
piṣṭānnāni ca sarvāṇi śākāni vividhāni ca |
vamane ca vireke ca snehane laṅghane tathā |
proktā me jvariṇaḥ kālāḥ sūtrasthāne savistarāḥ ||
jvarito varjayennityaṃ prāṇān rakṣec ca sarvaśaḥ ||
praduṣṭo mārutaḥ pānaṃ niśi jāgaraṇaṃ ca yat |

iti bhele cikitsite prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      viṣamajvaracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
|(ṃadhukośa on ṃṇ2.38)) kupitaḥ kopayatyāśu śleṣmāṇaṃ pittam eva ca ||
jvaro ' yaṃ prāṇināṃ dehe raudro māheśvaras tathā |
prayateta praśāntau tu tasmād asya vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
śakṛdrasaṃ payo mūtraṃ dadhi sarpiś ca pāyayet |
etena gulmāḥ śāmyanti kuṣṭhāni jaṭharāṇi ca ||
grahaṇī dīpyate tena vātagulmaś ca śāmyati ||
arśasāṃ śamanaṃ caiva gudaśophe ca pūjitam |
etad eva hi vai śreṣṭhamudāvarte ghṛtaṃ bhavet ||
mācipatraṃ ca tulyāni dviguṇaṃ kuṅkumaṃ bhavet |
etair eva uṣadhagaṇaiḥ pradehaṃ kārayed bhiṣak |
homairbalividhānaiś ca nāśayed viṣamajvaram || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele cikitsite dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      raktapittacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca martyānāṃ raktapittaṃ pravartate |
atas tu dvividhā proktā cikitsā raktapittinaḥ ||
pittalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ matsyādīnāṃ ca sevanāt ||
ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca kupitaṃ raktapittaṃ pravartate |
makṣikā vāpi tiktatvāc chuṣkaṃ pittaṃ ca lakṣyate |
lohagandhi mukhaṃ cāsya kaṇṭho dhūmāyate tathā |
ūrdhvabhāgaṃ tu sādhyaṃ syādadho vai yāpyamucyate |
sarvasrotaḥpravṛttaṃ tu raktapittaṃ na sidhyati || raktapittamadhobhāgaṃ
svapneṣu nityaṃ paśyanti śuṣkāndagdhāṃś ca pādapān |
ucitā hīyate chāyā tāluśoṣś ca jāyate ||
ūrū ca svidyato ' tyarthaṃ hāniś ca balavarṇayoḥ ||
aruciś cāvipākaś ca mūrchā śvāso mṛdurjvaraḥ ||
śoṣī nity ajugupsāluḥ sukhaśīlaś ca mānavaḥ ||
tad eva kṣīṇamāṃsasya prayuktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet |
bhojaneṣu praśaṃsanti mudgān sūpārtham eva ca |
taddhi vīryādahīnaṃ syānmāṃsaṃ sadyohataṃ ca yat |
śoṣī nityaṃ niṣeveta madyāni vividhāni ca |
śleṣmā dehe vivṛddho ' pi vāyunā susamīritaḥ ||
tasya bhuktaṃ na raktāya na māṃsāya ca kalpate ||
hetunā tena śuṣyanti śuṣyatāṃ śoṣavanti ca ||
kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ sahṛdrogaṃ jvaraṃ pārśvarujām api ||

dadyād ghṛtasamān bhāgān tatpacenmṛdunā ' gninā ||
      rasāyanīyam iti tat khyātaṃ
atha siddhaṃ ca pūtaṃ ca punastadvipaced ghṛtam |
atha siddhaṃ ca pūtaṃ ca punaragnāvadhiśrayet |
mathyamānaṃ tato dadyāddattvā dattvā ca manthayet ||
unmāda raktapittaṃ ca kāsaṃ caitena sādhayet ||
tatsiddhaṃ dāpayet pūtaṃ kalaśe rājate dṛḍhe |
prakṣipec ca tugākṣīryāḥ prasthaṃ prasthaṃ ca mākṣikāt |
uccaṭīkṣurasābhyāṃ ca dvau prasthau tatra dāpayet |

niṣpākaś cāsya tailasya samyak siddhasya yo bhavet
      |
udaśvidiva dadhyarthaṃ so ' pi kṛtyakaro bhavet ||
palaṃ tu madhukasyātra garbhaṃ kṣīraṃ caturguṇam ||
mṛdupākaṃ ca tatsiddhaṃ bhūya eva vipācayet |
nastaḥ kṛtaṃ praṇudati khālity aṃ palitāni ca ||
ca nārīṣu puṃsāṃ naṣṭe ca retasi |
bahūparodhāḥ strīnity āḥ teṣāṃ vṛṣyatamaṃ matam |
tilā bilvaṃ ca kalkaṃ syāt tatra rakṣayonmardanaṃ param ||
snānāni śāntihomāṃś ca śoṣī nityaṃ samācarete ||
tāś ca nityaṃ niṣeveta pūjayed vṛṣabhadhvajam ||
upadravāś ca ye śeṣe ṣaṭ caikādaśa coditāḥ |
teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathā sve sve cikitsite ||
yaśaḥsvargakaraṃ puṇyaṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele cikitsite caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      gulmacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
gulmatvaṃ teṣu vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak ||
abhyāgatya dūṣayati pūrvaṃ pittaṃ kaphaṃ tataḥ ||
dūṣayatyatha raktaṃ ca medo māṃsaṃ vidhāvati |
saṃsargo gulma ity uktaḥ saṃghāto gulma ucyate ||
saṃghāto gahanaṃ gulmaḥ tadvad gulmas tu dehinām ||
evaṃ śleṣmaṇi rakte ca sannipāte ca sarvaśaḥ |
sarveṣāṃ sannipāte tu svaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ nidarśanam ||
yadi vastigataḥ pākaṃ vātagulmas tu gacchati |
hṛnnābhyor antaraṃ gulmaḥ pākaṃ gacchati paittikaḥ ||
hṛdi ca śleṣmagulmas tu pākaṃ yāty ananuṣṭhitaḥ |
atyarthaṃ snihyamāno ' pi gulmo vṛddhim avāpnuyāt ||
tasmiddhaṃ srāvayitvā tu pāyayet tu yathābalam ||
vātagulmaṃ krimiṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ plīhānam eva ca |
prasthaṃ prasthaṃ pṛthak kṛtvā tasminn eva
viḍaṅgaṃ dāḍimaṃ hiṅgu nīlikāṃ trivṛtām api |
dvau kṣārau cājamodāṃ ca pāṭhāṃ pāṣāṇabhedakam ||
ūṣakaṃ vṛṣakaṃ bhārṅgīṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ hapuṣām api |
ekāṅgage pakṣagate gṛdhrasyāṃ plīhni caiva hi |
pippalīṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca maricaṃ ca samāvapet ||
eṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍeva syuḥ pṛthagbhāgāḥ palaṃ palam |
snehatulyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ tu kṣīraṃ taddviguṇaṃ bhavet ||
ghṛtaṃ ca saktuṃ ca tathā citrakaṃ saindhavaṃ
kuṣṭhaṃ ca sarpagandhā ca pañcaiva lavaṇāni ca |
dvau kṣārau trivṛtā dantī dravantī copakuñcikā ||
ghṛtena payasā vāpi madyenāmlena vā punaḥ ||

prasahya nāśayed gulmaṃ chinnābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ || vandhyā ca labhate garbhaṃ
      garānapi ca naśayet |
tatra kuṣṭhāni jāyante dehe bahuvidhāni tu |
teṣāṃ rūpāṇi vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ ca yathākramam ||
bhuktvā vāpy uṣṇamāhāraṃ madhu māṃsaṃ ca sevate |
madyaṃ madhu ca yaḥ pītvāt yuṣṇamannaṃ ca sevate ||
aṣṭādaśa tu kuṣṭhāni teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam |
samutpanneṣu vā teṣu stimitaṃ bahulaṃ guru ||
pāṇḍu snigdhaṃ ca guru ca yatkuṣṭhaṃ śleṣmasambhavam |
suptatvaṃ romaharṣaś ca gātrāṇāṃ gauravaṃ klamaḥ |
tataḥ kuṣṭhāni jāyante teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam |
nirāsrāvaiḥ sravadbhir vā vidyādaudumbaraṃ tu tat |
dṛḍhaṃ punaḥ prasravati kaṇḍūrodhānvitaṃ ca yat ||
śyāvā raktā samutpannā praklinnā srāviṇī tathā ||
tad ekakuṣṭham ity uktam ekaṃ vīsarpasambhavam |
ekakuṣṭhaṃ tu yatproktaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ vaipādikaṃ ca yat ||
etāni nava kuṣṭhāni na sidhyanti kadācana |
sidhmaṃ vicarcikā pāmā dadruś ca kiṭikāni ca ||
karmajāni na sidhyanti sidhyanti hītarāṇi tu ||

vamanaṃ recanaṃ caiva tathā śīrṣavirecanam || āsthāpanaṃ ca kurvīta na
      cainamanuvāsayet ||
śālīna saṣṭaṣṭikāṃś caiva jāṅgalāṃś ca mṛgadvijān |
kaphaṃ pittaṃ ca raktaṃ ca sarvametatprakopayet ||
pañcagavyaṃ vā tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā ||
prasadya khadiro hanti kuṣṭhāni sugurūṇy api |
pañcābhayās tu savyoṣāḥ saguḍā vāpi cūrṇitāḥ |
drākṣā haridrā mañjiṣṭhā triphalā devadāru ca |
nāgaraṃ pañcamūlyau dve mustā madhurasā tathā ||
viḍaṅgaṃ citrakaṃ dantī pippalyo maricāni ca ||
teṣāṃ tu samabhāgānāṃ kuṣṭhī cūrṇapalaṃ pibet |
etās tv ābhyantarāḥ proktāḥ kriyāḥ kuṣṭhanibarhaṇāḥ ||
bāhyāṃ kriyāṃ pravakṣyāmi vistareṇa nibodha me |
vighṛṣya śastraiḥ patrair vā gomayair api vā punaḥ |
manaḥśilā ca lodhraṃ ca lepaḥ kuṣṭhavināśanaḥ ||
citrakau sarṣapau dvau tu haridre dve vipeṣayet ||
striyaṃ ca yuktyā seveta divāsvapnaṃ ca varjayet |
sakaṣāyaṃ ca tiktaṃ ca paittikeṣu prayojayet ||
upadravaiś ca yuktānāṃ piṭakābhis tathaiva ca |
uddeśamātraṃ teṣāṃ tu tasmād vakṣyāmi bheṣajam |
pippalī śṛṅgiberaṃ ca maricāni tathaiva ca |
kapitthaś cājamodā ca maricāni tathaiva ca |
elāpravālakaṃ hiṅgu lavaṇaṃ ca samaṃ bhavet |
madyenoṣṇena vā pītaṃ mehaṃ sasikataṃ jayet ||
madayanty āś ca patrāṇāṃ kalkaṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ pibet |
darbhamūlasya ca tathā raktamehī sukhī bhavet ||
prātaḥ prātaś ca seveta kevale madhusarpiṣī |
iti bhele cikitsite saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
samīpasthān vijānāti trīn bhāvāṃś ca niyacchati ||
bodhanāc cāpi bodhyasya naro budha ihocyate ||
sā buddhiḥ paramātmā ca sa śarīre prakīrtitaḥ |
yathā kṛtī karmakaraḥ kriyāṃ yojayate nṛṣu ||
sandūṣitānāṃ teṣāṃ tu śṛṇu hetumataḥ param ||
purastādavalokī ca na yathāvṛtta eva ca ||
etāni yasya rūpāṇi sa mado nāma kīrtitaḥ ||
dādhikaṃ vā pibetsarpistailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
trāsāstīvrā hi kurvanti cittasya vikṛtiṃ bhayāt |
vedoktāḥ karmavidhayaḥ kāryāśconmādanāśanāḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele cikitsite aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto '
      pasmāracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
nidāneṣu, cikitsāṃ tu vistareṇa nibodha me ||

bhayād vā yadi śokād vā yo ' tisāraḥ
      pravartate |
sukhaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ kartuṃ pācanaṃ stambha eva ca ||
yukte kvāthe prayoktavyo baidyenāpi yaśo ' rthinā ||
pravartate nṛṇāṃ tasya śṛṇu samyak cikitsitam ||
kaphātmakaṃ sapittaṃ ca varco badhnāti ca dhruvam ||
śaṭī puṣkaramūlaṃ ca tathā hiṅgu harītakī |
sauvarcalaṃ dhātakī ca samaṅgā ceti tatsamam ||
mandaṃ dīpayate cāgniṃ śūlaṃ cāśu nivartayet ||
samaṅgā niculaṃ lodhraṃ dhātakī madhukaṃ tathā ||
pittātisāre padmaṃ ca taṇḍulādbhiḥ piben naraḥ |
kesaraṃ puṇḍarīkasya kumudaṃ kṣaudram eva ca |
bhayādvā yadi vā śokādyo ' tisāraḥ pravartate |
yaḥ kupyati tato doṣas tasya kuryāc cikitsitam ||
manaḥ prahṛṣṭaṃ kuryāc ca, tadā sampadyate sukhī ||
yasya keśāḥ pralupyante balaṃ varṇaś ca hīyate |
pariśuṣkamukho yaś ca na sa jīvati taddhidhaḥ

daśati yo ' bhīkṣṇaṃ na vedayati yo ' sukham
      |
saṃrakṣanvai yaśaḥ prājño na cainaṃ samupācaret |
arthaghnaṃ ca yaśoghnaṃ ca na karma samupācaret ||
dṛṣṭvā sādhyamasādhyaṃ ca yaḥ karoti sa sidhyati |
pūjāṃ ca labhate ' tyarthaṃ vidvatsu ca virājate ||
viṣūcyās tu pravakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ lakṣaṇāni ca |
adhaścordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca srotāṃsi niruṇaddhyati |
ruddhaiś ca mārute ruddhasrotāṃsi niruṇaddhi ca (?) ||
tasya kāso jvaro mūrchā bhaktadveṣo vivarṇatā |
vibandho gātrahāniś ca so ' laso nāma dāruṇaḥ |
tathā śvāsaś ca kāsaś ca pārśvaśīrṣarujānvitaḥ |
kūratvād asya rogasya bhūyo vakṣyāmi vistaram |
pītaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vamanaṃ sadyo hanti viṣūcikām ||
viruddhā hi rasā bhuktā dūṣitāḥ pavanādibhiḥ |
triphalāṃ ca yavānīṃ ca kuṭajasya phalāni ca |

vartimetāṃ śivāṃ nāma bastamūtreṇa peṣayet || viṣūcalākṣākṣāraś ca
       jāyate(?)
upanāhāś ca śasyante vastayaś cārdite hitāḥ || (Bhṣ6.10.2.3) |
ānūpaudakanity ānāṃ māṃsāny api ca lābhataḥ || (Bhṣ6.10.2.4) |
tilān kulutthānmāṣāṃś ca badarāṇi yavān balām |
tailamebhiś ca vipacedabhyañjyāc ca pibec ca tat |
etam eva ca sambhāram upanāhaṃ ca kārayet |
tad eva sarvaṃ nikhilam arditeṣv api kārayet || (Bhṣ6.10.2.8) |
mahāsnehaṃ balātailaṃ tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
sthānasthas tatra ca kaphaḥ vāyurāgantur ucyate |

tasmāt tayor gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā vātaghnīṃ kārayetkriyām || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      |

iti bhele ṣaḍviṃśo?? ' dhyāyaḥ || || ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
      grahaṇīcikitsāṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
mriyate hy upaśānte ' gnau yukte coṣmaṇi
tenendriyabalaṃ puṣṭiṃ varṇañ ca labhate naraḥ ||
caturvidhaṃ pacatyagniḥ samaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tathā mṛdu |
viṣamaṃ ceti teṣāṃ tu yaḥ samo ' gniḥ sa śasyate ||
bhajatāṃ guru rūkṣaṃ ca divāsvapnaṃ ca nity aśaḥ |
atisāraś ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca śūlānyalasako bhramaḥ ||
grahaṇī dūṣitā jantoḥ sāmā rogānnihanti vā ||
na pacyate ' nnaṃ kālena sa mandāgniriti smṛtaḥ ||
agnau mande kaphenāsya śīghraṃ bhuktaṃ na pacyate |

rūpaś ca vṛddhaś ca kaphe
      tasya
evaṃ sa viṣamo nāma grahaṇīdoṣa ucyate ||
bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ jarayate na ca varṇabalāya ca ||
bhukte bhukte kṣudhāpyasya jāyate na ca puṣyati |
atyagniriti taṃ vidyāt sa ca duḥkhatamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
proktas tasya cikitsāṃ tu vistareṇa nibodha me ||
tato ' smai vamanaṃ dadyāt tataś cordhvaṃ virecanam ||
takraṃ māsaṃ pibec cāpi gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā ||
piṣṭvā tu tasya caivāsthi kṣīreṇa saha pāyayet |
mūtrakṛcchrāṇi śamayed aśmarīṃ ca bhinatty api ||
ebhir yadi prayogais tu śarkarā nopaśāmyati |
anusannaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca śṛṇu tasya cikitsitam ||
viśuddhe retaso mārge mārutaḥ praguṇī bhavet |
svaṃ sthānaṃ mārute prāpte kṛcchraṃ tasya nivartate ||
rūpāṇi caiva sarveṣāṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || trayodaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
      udaracikitsāṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
tasya dehe kapho duṣṭaḥ sirāḥ kaphavahā gataḥ |
tasyāṅgamardaḥ kāsaś ca śvāso hikkā ca jāyate |
nidrā tandrā tathālasyaṃ dāhaś cāṅgagato bhavet ||
viṣapīte ca yalliṅgaṃ tac ca tasyopajāyate ||
tathā snigdhāvabhāsañ ca snigdharomācitaṃ ca yat ||
unnataṃ jāyate tasmād udaraṃ syāt samantataḥ |
tathā muñjaiś ca bālaiś ca bhuktairantraṃ niveṣṭyate ||
tena baddhaṃ gudaṃ nṝṇāṃ jāyate ' ntranipīḍanāt |
natonnataḥ samaś cāpi naro baddhodarī bhavet |
āmadhānyayavān yas tu naro bhuṅkte niṣevate ||
mahauṣadhaṃ samaricaṃ dvau kṣārau triphalā vacā |
kaṭukā kauṭajaṃ bījaṃ saindhavaṃ ca samān bhiṣak ||
trivṛtā saptalā dantī kampillaṃ nīlikā ' bhayā |
āje gavye ' thavā mūtre saptāhaṃ paribhāvya tam |
dviguṇaṃ śarkarāṃ cātra dāpayet tryaṅgulaṃ pibet ||
kukṣiṃ vipāṭya mānena chidramantrasya vīkṣya ca |
mardayed udaraṃ cāsya veṣṭanena tu veṣṭayet ||
tataḥ paraṃ tu kṣīreṇa māsārdhaṃ samupācaret |
tataḥ kṣīrayavāgūṃ ca, trīnmāsāṃs tu yavānbhiṣak ||
tataś ca salilodbhūtiṃ picchanaiś ca vinirdiśet |
kriyāyatīś ca sarvāṇi sakriyāpiś ca dehinām(?) ||

bhallātakānāṃ pavanāhatānāṃ vṛntacyutānām iha cāṭhakaṃ
      syāt |
pādāvaśiṣṭaṃ paripūtaśītaṃ kṣīreṇa tulyena punaḥ paceta ||
na cānnapāne parihāryamasti na coṣṇavātādhvani maithune ca ||
dantāś ca śīrṇāḥ punarudbhavanti keśāś ca śuklāḥ punareva
so ' pi krameṇāṅguligātraśākhastaruryathā rohati vārisiktaḥ || Bhṣ6.13.? |
tarkārī pragrahaś caiva pīlūni niculāni ca ||
asanaḥ sptaparṇaś ca triphalā maricāni ca |
etānyeva ca cūrṇāni mākṣikeṇa piben naraḥ |
tulyāny etāni sarvāṇi valmīkasya ca mṛttikā |
rāsnā vacā hy arkamūlaṃ hiṃsrā dantī tathaiva ca |
śatapuṣpā ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca dve haridre punarnavā ||
dve pañcamūlyau triphalā citrako devadāru ca |
cirabilvo hy aśokaś ca balā cāṃśumatī tathā |
kuṣṭhaṃ ca śatapuṣpā ca citrakastryūṣaṇaṃ tathā |
devadārvagaru śreṣṭhaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ mustam eva ca ||
aśvagandhā ca pāṭhā ca mūrvā śyonāka eva ca |
bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikān jīrṇān purāṇāṃś caiva śālikān ||

samyak proktam idaṃ sarvamūrustambhacikitsitam || ity 
      āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
athāto visarpavātaśoṇitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
visarpāḥ pañca nirdiṣṭās teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||
tasya vāyuḥ prakupitaḥ tvagraktaṃ māṃsam eva ca ||
sirāś ca samadhiṣṭhāya visarpaṃ janayed balī
pipīlikāṃ visarpantīṃ manyate tu, ghṛte ' pi ca (?) ||
ghoraś cāruṇavarṇābhaḥ śvayathuḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca ||
ity eṣa vātavīsarpaḥ tasya karmavidhiṃ śṛṇu |
kṣīraṃ ca yavacūrṇaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ caivātra sādhayet |
gavāṃ mūtraṃ ca kṣīraṃ ca gośakṛdrasa eva vā |
rāsnāṃ ca madhukaṃ caiva peṣayed dadhimastunā |
yatra yatra ca jāyante sphoṭās tatra vilīyate |
tasya śleṣmā prakupito rakte tiṣṭhati dehinaḥ |
sphoṭāś ca tasya jāyante śvayathuḥ pāṇḍureva ca |
tasya tandrā ca nidrā ca jvaraḥ kāsaḥ śirograhaḥ ||
cirāc ca pākaṃ vrajati visarpaḥ śleṣmasambhavaḥ |
vamanaṃ recanaṃ caiva kuryāt tasya yathābalam ||
tailvakaṃ vā pibetsarpiḥ purāṇaṃ ghṛtam eva vā |
kaṣāyaṃ sādhayed etaṃ sukhoṣṇena ca secayet ||
māṃsopanāhaṃ kurvīta ślaiṣmike vātike ' pi vā ||
maṇḍalaṃ tatra jāyate kṛṣṇam eva ca ||
jvarastṛṣṇā ca dāhaś ca chardirmūrchā bhramas tathā ||
dagdhe ca śoṇite gātraṃ śuṣkālābunibhaṃ bhavet ||
sukumāraṃ balātailaṃ tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
pāne ' bhyaṅge ca vastau ca balātailaṃ praśasyate ||

suvikalpya prayogavit || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
      |

pañcadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣoḍaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto ' rśasāṃ
      cikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
sahajāni ca raktāc ca ṣoḍārśāṃsyatha dehinām ||
adṛśyānāṃ ca yatproktaṃ dṛśyānāṃ ca yathākramam ||
nity ājīrṇabhujāṃ cāpi vegānāṃ ca vidhāraṇāt ||
nirūḍhāste gude kīlāḥ stambhayanti gudaṃ bhṛśam |
nityaṃ gāḍhapurīṣaś ca bhinnavarcāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ||
śūlāś cāsyopajāyanta ādhmānaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ ||
pāṇḍuvarṇaś ca bhavati pītābhāsaś ca lakṣyate |
dahyate ca gudo ' tyarthaḥ gudapākaś ca jāyate ||
purīṣaṃ sakaphaṃ yāti stokaṃ stokaṃ savedanam ||
śūyate meḍhravṛṣaṇaṃ vastiś ca guda eva ca ||
aruciś cāvipākaś ca na ca pakvaṃ viricyate |
cireṇa ca pravāho ' sya prasaktaṃ vā kadācana ||
vahanti dhārayā raktaṃ yathā viddhā sirā sthitā ||
atīvamuḥ draṃ surāṃ(?) dantīṃ kakubhaṃ samayūrakam ||
gavāṃ ca mahiṣīṇāṃ ca mūtrāṇyatha samācaret |
arśasāṃ vātikānāṃ tu yaduktaṃ vai cikitsitam ||
tad eva ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ tu snehavarjaṃ samācaret |
ṛtuṃ vāpy ayanaṃ vāpi pibenmāsamathāpi vā |
lodhraṃ dāruharidrā ca majjā baibhītakī tathā ||
śirīṣapuṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ ca kauṭajaṃ kakubhasya ca ||
dārvī haridrā lodhraṃ ca dhātakī kaṭphalaṃ vṛṣaḥ |
madhukaṃ badaraṃ drākṣā mūlaṃ ca kuśakāśayoḥ ||
kaṭphalaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca pippalī candanaṃ tathā |
etatsiddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ yuktyā raktārśo vai vināśayet ||
pittajeṣv api cārśassu hitaṃ tadraktajeṣv api ||
pippalī kuḍavārdhaṃ ca cavyasya palam eva ca |
dve pale pippalīmūlaṃ citrakasya palaṃ tathā |
pūrvaṃ bhaktasya paścādvā bhakṣayet tu yathābalam ||
madyair māṃsarasair yūṣaiḥ kṣīraiś cāpy upabhojayet |
tasmād arśo vistareṇa cikitset tu cikitsakaḥ |
śastreṇa chedanaṃ teṣāṃ kṣāreṇa dahanaṃ tathā ||
abhyajya nābhiṃ kukṣiṃ ca vastimuṣkau gudaṃ tathā ||
amlaiḥ kṣīraiś ca mūtraiś ca sukhoṣṇaiḥ pariṣecayet |
tenopanāhaṃ kurvīta svedayec ca punaḥ punaḥ ||
mahānimbaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kāsīsam eva ca ||
viḍaṅgaṃ hemadugdhāṃ ca haritālaṃ ca peṣayet |

hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ ca tutthaṃ ca bilvaṃ bhallātakāni ca
      |
arśasāṃ lepanaṃ tena saptarātraṃ punaḥ punaḥ ||
arṇāṃsi lepayet tena saptarātraṃ punaḥ punaḥ |

dahyante ' rśāṃsi saptāhāt puṃstvaṃ ca na
      vinaśyati |
dhūpanaṃ candanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śiṃsapāsāra eva ca |
gavāṃ śakṛc ca vārāhaṃ patre vāriṣṭaśigruje ||

raktajāssahajā yāpyāḥ sādhyā anye trayo ' pi te || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

ṣoḍaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      śvayathucikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
sadyo vānto virikto vā gurūṇyannāni sevate |
matsyān dadhi payo bhuṅkte divāsvapnaratiś ca yaḥ |
laghūni sevate ' tyarthaṃ rūkṣāṇi tu viśeṣataḥ ||
tasya vātaḥ prakupitaḥ śirā bāhyāḥ prapadyate |
sa pittaṃ kopayatyāśu raktaṃ śleṣmāṇam eva ca ||
tvadhiko hi syāt sa svarūpaṃ hi darśayet ||
asādhyaścopasargaś ca śvayathuḥ prasṛtaś ca yaḥ ||
abhighātāc ca jātānāṃ māṃsamasthi ca pīḍitam |
mākṣikeṇa ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca lihyāt kṣīreṇa vā pibet ||
sakṣīraṃ vā pibenmūtraṃ māhiṣaṃ mūtram eva vā ||
auṣṭraṃ mūtraṃ pibeccaiva taduṣṭrīkṣīram eva vā |
mūlakāni ca siddhāni sānile bhakṣayen naraḥ |
vārtākī niculaṃ mūlaṃ triphalā citrako vacā |
cūrṇany etāni tulyāni dviguṇaṃ syādayor ajaḥ |
palaṃ palaṃ ca kurvīta dantīcitrakayor api |
śṛṅgaberapale dve ca gavyāt pañca palāni ca |
rāsnā balā gokṣurakaṃ madhukaṃ devadāru ca |
kaṭphalaṃ sāribe dve ca śyāmā bhallātakāni ca |
ayor ajīyam ity etat khyātaṃ siddharasāyanam ||
bhagandaraṃ kāmilāṃ ca kuṣṭhāni jaṭharāṇi ca |
taṃ taṃ nihanti vai rogaṃ devārīn keśavo yathā |
kṣīrānupānaṃ lehyo ' yaṃ divasān spta pañca vā |
tathā kṣīṇeṣu kāseṣu jvareṣu viṣameṣu ca |

śophasyopadravāḥ smṛtāḥ || ity āha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |

saptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta
      udāvartacikitsitaṃ vyākhayāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
etairanyaiś ca gurubhir hetubhiḥ kupito ' nilaḥ ||
sa śoṣayati tatrasthaḥ śarīraṃ śoṣayan bhṛśam ||
atha śūlāni tīvrāṇi dāho mūrcchā vivarṇatā |
vatāvatha ca kukṣau ca hṛdi pārśvodare tathā |
niśvasity atha tāmyaṃś ca tṛṣyaty api ca hikkate |
ekaṃ dvau vā bhiṣak kṛtvā yāvadvā
bhinnavarṇo ' tha dīnaś ca hṛdi kaṇḍūś ca jāyate |
hṛdrogaḥ krimijaḥ proktaḥ pañcamassa tu durjayaḥ ||
dvau cāsādhyau smṛtau tatra sādhyānāṃ śṛṇu bheṣajam ||
sukhodakena madyair vā cūrṇāny etāni pāyayet |
arśaḥ śūlaṃ sahṛdrogaṃ gulmaṃ cāpi vyapohati ||
caturguṇena payasā pātavyaṃ yuktitaś ca tat ||
vasā lābhena majjā ca tulyaṃ tailaghṛtaṃ tathā ||
vacā trikaṭukaṃ rāsnā jīvantī jīvako balā ||
hṛdrogaṃ vātikaṃ snehaḥ sadya eva cikitsati |
laghūni cānnapānāni śasyante teṣu sarvadā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

ekonaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || viṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
      kāsacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
teṣāṃ rūpāṇi vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ ca pṛthagvidhām |
pārśve ca rujato ' tyarthaṃ śvāsena ca vikūjati |
śaṅkhayor jāyate śūlaṃ tāluśoṣas tathaiva ca ||
gurutvaṃ śiraso ' tyarthaṃ mādhuryaṃ vadanasya ca ||
nihanyate yasya vakṣaḥ kṣatakāsaḥ sa ucyate ||
sa tāmyetkāsamānaś ca tṛṣṇā śoṣo mukhasya ca ||
tasya jvaraḥ pārśvarujā hastapādaṃ ca dahyate |
kāsamānaś ca niṣṭhīvet kaphapūrvaṃ sa śoṇitam ||
kṣīyete balavarṇau ca gātraṃ ca parihīyate |
kṣatakāsas tu yāpyaḥ syāt sādhyānāṃ sādhanaṃ śṛṇu |
rasayanaṃ ca seveta sarpiḥ sarpirguḍāni ca |
yaduktaṃ śoṇite pūrvaṃ tatkāseṣv api yojayet |
lājā ghṛtaṃ mākṣikaṃ ca lehaḥ kāsavināśanaḥ |
tryūṣaṇaṃ triphalāṃ caiva padmakaṃ devadāru ca |
eṣa lehaḥ praṇudati pañca kāsān samutthitān ||
rāsnā karkaṭakākhyā ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||
palāni viṃśatiṃ datvā taṃ lehaṃ sāndramuddharet ||
śīte dadyāt pippalīnāṃ cūrṇasya kuḍavaṃ mitam |
tugākṣīryāś ca kuḍavaṃ madhunaḥ kuḍavaṃ tathā ||
citrakaṃ cātmaguptāṃ ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||
yavāḍhakaṃ sahaibhiś ca jalaṃ pañcāḍhakaṃ pacet |
raktaṃ vāyuś ca kupitau mastake pratitiṣṭhataḥ ||
sa mastakagato vāyuḥ raktaṃ caikatra mūrchitam |
vedanāṃ janayet tīvrāṃ śaṅkhayor mūrdhni gaṇḍayoḥ |
virecanaṃ ca kāryaṃ syāt tatrarahā śīrṣavirecanam ||
mayūrān kukkuṭān lāvān kṣīreṇa saha sādhayet |
kālā guḍūcī suṣavī padmakaṃ madhukaṃ balā ||
palalaṃ dadhi matsyāṃś ca piṣṭānnavikṛtīḥ payaḥ |
netrayor āmayān kuryāc chaṅkhau cāsya pratodayet ||
śīrṣārdhaṃ śaṅkhamūlaṃ ca dārayantau ca tiṣṭhataḥ ||
virecanaṃ ca śiraso nasyakarma ca kārayet |
vasā sarvā ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ ca yuktitaḥ
tasyaiva mahatīṃ mātrāṃ pāyayet tena sidhyati |
kārpāsabījaṃ māṣāṃś ca godhūmān sarṣapān yavān ||
pañcamūlyau tathā dve ca kṣīreṇa saha sādhayet |
uṣṇaiś ca taiḥ kṣīrasiddhaiḥ kuryāt tasyopanāhanam |
karañjaṃ śigrubījāni tvak patraṃ śarkarā tathā ||
śiraso ' nte lalāṭānte śaṅkhaparyanta eva ca ||
manyayoś cāpi pippalyā dahetkāṇḍena vā punaḥ |
vātike śīrṣaroge ca dahanaṃ ślaiṣmike ' pi ca |
tasya pūrvaṃ śirāṃ vidhyet pibejjīrṇaghṛtaṃ tathā ||
ajājyo maricaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ bilvaṃ sauvarcalaṃ tathā ||
dārvī haridrā mustā ca tejohvā madhukaṃ balā ||
vātikaḥ karṇaśūlaś ca karṇavātaś ca vātikaḥ |
pippalyau bilvamūlaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ madhukam eva ca |
tena karṇe picuṃ dadyānnasyakarma ca kārayet |
śairīṣaṃ śatapākaṃ ca balātailaṃ ca miśrakam |
tat sarvaṃ srāvayitvā tu svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet |
etena śīrṣarogāś ca karṇaśūlāni yāni ca |
karṇasrāvāś ca śāmyanti rogā jatrugatāś ca ye ||
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi raktajaṃ krimijaṃ ca yat ||
śvayathuś ca hi rāgaś ca karṇaśūlaś ca jāyate ||
trayūṣaṇaṃ saindhavaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ tathā ||
sūkṣmailā tagaraṃ patraṃ tvagvyāghranakham eva ca |
bhoginaś ca vasāṃ dadyānmāṃsaṃ babhroḥ kharasya ca ||
praviśya karṇasroto vai bhṛśaṃ kurvanti vedanām |

srute kīṭe tu yadyasya karṇasrāvaḥ pravartate || yathoktaṃ tasya kurvīta
      karṇasrāvacikitsitam
ajīrṇe yaddivā bhuktaṃ na duṣyati yathā nṛṇām |
vyuṣitaṃ dūṣyate vāpi tatra hetuṃ nibodha me ||
mande rasapraseke ca divābhuktaṃ na duṣyati ||
vibuddhe hṛdaye cāsya srotassu vivṛteṣu ca |
na kledam upagacchanti divā tenāsya dhātavaḥ |
ajīrṇe prātarāśe tu tṛptasyāpi divā tatha ||
saṃvṛteṣv ayaneṣvevaṃ vāyuś cāgniś ca dehinām |
nidrāṃ caivātinidrāṃ ca mūrchāṃ caiva nibodha me |
bhukte ' nne pacyamāne ca śleṣmaṇā hṛdgatena tu ||
śārīramānasaiś caiva tais tair uktair upāhṛtā
sevate gocaraṃ teṣāṃ viddhi taṃ svapnanāmakam ||
sannipatya ca raktaṃ ca trayo doṣāś ca dūṣitāḥ |
saṃpīḍitaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ manaścittaṃ ca mohayet |
sarvadehāśrayā vātāḥ saṃsṛṣṭāś caikajāś ca ye |
teṣāṃ nigrahaṇe yuktam ity uvāca punarvasuḥ ||
palāni daśa piṣṭāni balāyās tatra dāpayet |
vyāpannāsu ca yonīṣu śastaṃ naṣṭe ca retasi |
rāsnāmūlasya kurvīta dve śate ca balāśatam |
droṇān daśa ca dugdhasya ghṛtasyārdhaḍhakaṃ tathā |
kāyasthāṃ ca vayasthāṃ ca madhuparṇīṃ sacitrakām ||
bhojane ' bhyañjane pāne vastau nasye ca śasyate |
apasmāre raktagulme puṃsāṃ naṣṭe ca retasi ||
laṅghanaṃ tasya kurvīta tathā saṃśodhanāni ca |
tasmāt tasya virūkṣāṇi bhojanāni kaṭūni ca ||
ariṣṭāśśīdhavaś caiva hitaṃ māṃsaṃ ca jāṅgalam |
vātaśoṇitake tat tu kuryād raktagate ' nile |
śreṣṭhaṃ mūlakatailaṃ vā tailaṃ sahacarasya vā |
gṛdhrasyāṃ tu praśasyante śoṇitasya ca mokṣaṇam |
aśītirvātajā rogāḥ ye ye pūrvaṃ prakīrtitāḥ ||
teṣāmeṣā cikitsā tu vāyoḥ sthāneṣu saptasu |
sādhyā ye cāpy asādhyās tu rogā mārutasambhavāḥ ||
karoti māruto ' nye ca vātarogā bhavanty api |
vāto hi jīvite hetuḥ prāṇināṃ ca
sāgare kurute velāṃ vāyurmeghān sṛjaty api ||
etāś cānyāś ca bahavo vāyor guṇavibhāvanāḥ
tasmāt prayatnatas tasya cikitsāṃ bhiṣajāṃ varaḥ |
kuryāc chāstrānusāreṇa tathā siddhim avāpnuyāt || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele caturviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
plīhahalīmakacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
bhuktvā pītodako yas tu sahasā saṃpradhāvati |
rogairanyaiś ca klinnānāṃ kurbalānāṃ ca dehinām |
pītakaḥ stabdhagātraś ca plīhā pittātmako bhavet ||
trayāṇāṃ yatra rūpāṇi doṣāṇāṃ lakṣayed bhiṣak |
asādhyam iti taṃ vidyāt plīhānaṃ sānnipātikam ||
mārdvīkaṃ ca pibedyuktyā gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā |
candraprabhaṃ śārkaraṃ vā pāyayet tu halīmake ||
ayor ajīyaṃ kṣīreṇa pāyayet tu rasāyanam |

agastyābhayalehaṃ vā seveta prayataḥ śuciḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ || iti
      bhele pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaḍviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto '
      patantrakacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
mukte ca hṛdi vātena punaḥ svāsthyaṃ niyacchati |
bhūyas tu śete srastākṣo muhyatyaprayato yathā ||
sannirodhāc ca nāḍīnāṃ yantritānāṃ ca vegataḥ ||
na cainaṃ vāmayed dhīro na cāpy enaṃ virecayet ||
pippalyo ' tha viḍaṅgāni śigrūṇi maricani ca ||
śvasato yasya saṃvṛddhiḥ śleṣmaṇo mārutasya ca ||
yogo ' yaṃ śamayatyāśu śūlaṃ gulmaṃ ca vātikam |
ādārī ca vidārī ca suvahā keśavaty api ||
harītakyāś ca pañcād dve ca sauvarcalātpale
hanumūlaṃ śiraś cāpi grīvāṃ caivārdayaty api ||
jihmaṃ kutute tasya vadanaṃ cakṣureva ca |
kampate ' sya śirogrīvaṃ nāsā vakrībhavaty api ||
vraṇasya kāle sampaśyan tataḥ kuryād upakramam |
bhedanaṃ pācanaṃ caiva stambhanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ tathā ||
srāvaṇaṃ ropaṇaṃ caiva vraṇe kuryād upakramam |
triphalā dhātakī lodhraṃ samaṅgā madhukaṃ balā ||
dve bṛhatyau samudrāntā tathaiva ca śatāvarī |
amlaṃ dadhi ca śākaṃ ca māṃsaṃ cānūpavārijam ||
pācanaṃ yac ca tastulyaṃ bhaved anyac ca kiṃcana |
pālāśasya ca niryāso niryāsaḥ kakubhasya ca |
sūkṣmāny etāni cūrṇāni vraṇānāṃ ropaṇaṃ param ||
gugguloḥ sallakīnāṃ ca sarjasya tiniśasya ca |
niryāsā ropaṇāḥ poktāḥ samastāḥ pṛthageva vā ||
vraṇe dhūmakramā ye ca pratyutpattau ca yā kriyā |
etaccheṣaṃ śalyakṛtā kartavyaṃ dṛṣṭakarmaṇā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

athātaḥ pānātyayacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
      ātreyaḥ |
sarve lavaṇavarjyās tu rasā madye pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
dīpanīyaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca sarvabhūtahitaṃ laghu |
taikṣṇyān mohayate cittam auṣṇyāt pittakaraṃ ca tat ||
tṛṣṇā nopaśamaṃ yāti pānaṃ jīryati cāśu ca |
bhrāmitasya tu madyena pittaṃ vāyuś ca dehinaḥ ||
śabdān manojñān śṛṇvaṃś ca manojñaissaha bandhubhiḥ ||
āranālaṃ ca śukraṃ ca koladāḍimayo rasau |
lājāḥ santarpaṇāś caiva sūkṣmāś ca yavatarpaṇāḥ ||
mṛṇmaye tatra vai bhāṇḍe svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||
dve ca dadyād guḍapale śarkarāyāḥ palaṃ tathā |
sūkṣmaṃ ca maricātkarṣaṃ caturthaṃ kesarasya ca ||
tvakpatradharaṇe dve ca sūkṣmailākarṣam eva ca |
aruciṃ mūtrakṛcchraṃ ca hanyāt pānātyayaṃ nṛṇām ||
kesaraṃ cātra dātavyaṃ puṣpaṃ nīlotpalasya ca |
dve guḍūcī pale dve ca balā dvipalam eva ca |
pāyayet taṃ trivṛccūrṇaṃ yuktyā madyena saṃyutam ||
vamanīyaṃ yadā vidyāt tadainaṃ vāmayed bhiṣak |
na hi peyāḥ praśasyante manuṣyāṇāṃ madātyaye ||
jāṣyāt pānasya pītasya vegaṃ janayate punaḥ ||
pānena saha saṃsṛṣṭā janayanty āmayān bahūn |
madyātyaye prakurvīta kriyāḥ śītāś ca sarvaśaḥ |
tulyaṃ hi rasavīryābhyāṃ viṣaṃ madyaṃ ca kīrtitam |
tasmād uṣṇodakaṃ svedaṃ dhūmaṃ pānaṃ ca sarpiṣaḥ ||
dadhi dugdhaṃ ca śākaṃ ca grāmyānūpaudakāni ca ||
atimātraṃ yadā pānaṃ pītaṃ kopayate ' nilam |

toyaṃ madyaṃ ca śuktaṃ ca dadhi tvamlaṃ ca
      kāñjikam |
pakvaṃ pīlurasaṃ vāpi vārtākīrasam eva vā ||
ślaiṣmike pānaroge ca madyena vamanaṃ hitam ||
paṭolaṃ picumandaṃ ca madanasya ca pallavam |
dīpanīyāṃś ca seveta yogān pānena nity aśaḥ |
sarvataḥ sannipāte tu sadā kuryāc cikitsitam |
ahāni sapta cāṣṭau vā nṛṇāṃ pānātyaye smṛtam ||
pānaṃ hi bhajate jīrṇamata ūrdhvaṃ vimārgataḥ |
anena kālayogena yo rogo na nivartate ||
hikkāśvāsādayo rogā ye ca sarve samutthitāḥ ||
teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathā sve sve cikitsite |

prajāhitam idaṃ proktaṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha
      bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ
      cikitsāsthānaṃ samāptam || || kalpasthānam || || prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
      athāto
madanakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma it ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
piṇḍītakāni tu trīṇi saṃgrahoktāni me śṛṇu |
kṛṣṇaṃ śvetamubhe tac ca tritayaṃ madanaṃ smṛtam ||
yadā na paripūrṇān paripakvāni tāni ca |
dvidhā tridhā śodhayitvā samyak saṃśodhya cāvapet ||
nidhūme ca nivāte ca kapāṭapihite gṛhe ||
atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet |
pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu nā |
anena kalpena bhiṣak pāyayet tu yathābalam ||

kākodumbarikāyāś ca kuṣṭhākhyāyās tathaiva ca || ekaikasya kaṣāyeṇa
       susnigdhaṃ pāyayed bhiṣak |

|| tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. ha smāha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |
payasā dadhi kṛtvā vā pāyayet tu yathābalam |
pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ charayet tena sādhu saḥ |
ikṣvākūṇāṃ prasṛtaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇāni kārayet ||
yathābalaṃ pāyayet tu chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |
etena khalu kalpena kuśānāṃ tagarasya ca ||
yathābalaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ ||

prayojyo deśakālataḥ ||
       ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele kalpasthāne tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
       dhāmārgavakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet ||
pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ ||
utpalaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca naladaṃ kumudaṃ tathā |
anenaiva ca kalpena sukhaṃ vamati mānavaḥ ||
rohitasya ca matsyasya tathā karkaṭakasya ca |

iti bhele caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
       kuṭajakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
vasante vā śaradi vā kuṭajāny uddhared bhiṣak |
atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet |
pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |
anenaiva ca kalpena kaṣāyaṃ kārayed bhiṣak ||
eṣām eva phalānāntu muṣṭiṃ saṃgṛhya sannakham ||
yathābalaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |

ya evaṃ samprajānāti sa rājñāṃ kartumarhati || ity āha
       bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele kalpasthāne pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ ||
       athātaścaturaṅgulīyaṃ kalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
tataḥ pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃ lehyaṃ tena viricyate ||
etenaiva ca kalpena kaṇṭakāryāḥ phalair api |
prasthaṃ kaṇātrivṛtayor madhunaś ca nihanti tat |
pādāvaśiṣṭaṃ paripūtaśītaṃ kṣīreṇa tulyena punaḥ paceta ||

tatpādaśiṣṭaṃ punareva śītaṃ ghṛtena tulyena punaḥ
       paceta |

na cānnapāne parihāryamāste na coṣṇavātādhvani maithune
       ca |

śīrṇāḥ punarudbhavanti keśāś ca śuklāḥ
       punareva
tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate ||
tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |

maitre muhūrte vyakte tu yogānetān prayojayet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
       || iti bhele kalpasthāne ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ
       ||

athāto dantīphalakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
       |
eteṣāṃ caiva mūlānāṃ kṛtvā cūrṇāni sūkṣmaśaḥ ||
tad dṛḍhe madhulipte tu nave kumbhe samāvapet |
prasṛtaṃ pāyayet tatra tena sādhu viricyate |
eteṣāṃ caiva mūlānāṃ kṛtvā cūrṇāni sarvaśaḥ ||
śyāmākaṣāyeṇāloḍya dve vā tisro ' pi vā tataḥ |
pāyayet tu yathotsāhaṃ taṃ snigdhasveditaṃ naram ||

prasidhyati viśodhanam || ity āha
       bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele kalpasthāne saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭhamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
       śaṅkhinīkalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
na vyagre na ca valmīke na cāpi tṛṇachādite |
susame bhūpradeśe tu yā jātā śaṅkhinī bhavet ||
śaṅkhinyā hy akṣamātraṃ tu trivṛtkalkamathāpi vā ||
sa pibettad yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
ardhaṃ cūrṇāni pippalyā harītakyāś ca dāpayet ||
tāṃstrīn dvau vātha saṃbhakṣya tatassādhu viricyate |
surāṃ sauvīrakaṃ takraṃ dadhimas tu tuṣodakam ||

sa rājñāṃ kartumarhati || ity āha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele kalpasthāne ' ṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ
       śyāmātrivṛtkalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
hariṇasaya rasaṃ dadyānnyaṅkoś ca mahiṣasya ca |
yathābalaṃ pāyayet tu susnigdhaṃ sveditaṃ naram ||
tasmiṃs tathā pacyamāne cūrṇāny etāni dhāpayet ||
priyaṅguṃ tagaraṃ caiva tālīsaṃ naladaṃ tathā |
nalinaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||
candanaṃ padmakaṃ nīpaṃ sālaṃ saptacchadaṃ tathā ||
ye cānye tiktamadhurā rasāḥ pūrvaṃ prakīrtitāḥ ||
phalāni cūrṇāni patrāṇi ca payāṃsi ca ||
ya uktāḥ sthāvarāḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ |
etat sarvaṃ samāyojya modakaṃ kārayed bhiṣak ||
atha vā kārayellehaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
mṛgasya mūtraṃ gomūtraṃ gardabhasya dvipasya ca |
etānyaṣṭau prayuñjīta pṛthagvā yadi vā saha ||
atha vā dadhimaṇḍena kolakānāṃ rasena vā ||
sakṣaudraṃ saguḍaṃ vāpi lihyāt sakaṭukaṃ tathā |
pānāni ca phalāmlāni bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca saṃskṛtam |
tāni cūrṇāni madhunā sarpiṣā vā guḍena vā |
saumye tithau muhūrte ca nakṣatre karaṇe śubhe ||
tato ' smai vamanaṃ deyaṃ pūjayitvā bhiṣagvarān ||
madhyaṃ syājjyeṣṭhaṃ prasthās tu te nava ||

kanīyo madhyamaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ trividhāni pṛthak pṛthak
       |
apītapūrvaṃ vamanaṃ vireko vāpi yena tu ||
tripalaṃ śreṣṭham ākhyātaṃ kanīyas tu palaṃ bhavet ||
madhyaṃ dve pale vidyāditi me niścitā matiḥ |
taruṇā balavantaś ca vāmayed uttamena tān |
sarpiṣā bheṣajaiścemaiḥ sukhoṣṇaṃ śītam eva vā |
bandhujīvo ' tha pippalyo madanaṃ sarpireva ca |
madanasya ca patrāṇi puṣpāṇi saphalāni ca |
śreṣṭhaś ca viṣayukteṣu kāsaśvāse tu pūjitaḥ ||
kiṃ tatra bheṣajaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ vaidyaḥ samācaret ||
etena tu prayogeṇa kṣipraṃ chardayate naraḥ |
hṛdayaṃ pṛṣṭhadeśaṃ ca vigṛhya ca vamen naraḥ |
kaphaṃ hi pūrvaṃ vamati tataḥ pittamanantaram |
hṛllāso ' tha sirāharṣo manyā kaṇṭhaś ca dīryate ||
sannipātasamutthāś ca yoniduṣṭāś ca yāḥ striyaḥ |
śleṣmaṇā ca svayaṃ sthānaṃ suviriktasya laksaṇam ||
caturvidhaṃ nasyam āhuḥ pṛthaktvena tu me śṛṇu || 8|
pratiśyāyaś ca kāsaś ca śvāso hikkā biḍālikā ||
avapīḍe ' tha dhūme vā dvandvaśaḥ sarvaśo ' pi vā ||
vivṛtiḥ kheṣu viśadā na ca śleṣmā prasicyate |
vādhirye karṇaśūle ca karṇamūlāc ca bhedane ||
nasyakarma hitaṃ teṣāṃ tailaṃ vā sarpireva vā ||

palasamaiḥ siddhaṃ tailaṃ vā yadi
       vā
na pītamātre pānīye jvaritasya na dāpayet ||
na maithunaṃ gatavataḥ madyapītasya naiva ca |
pañcakarmavidhānajño rājārho bhiṣagucyate || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto
       daśavyāpadīyāṃ vamanavirecanasiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |
hṛdrogaś caiva śūlaṃ ca tathaiva parikartikā ||
asminnapi jarāṃ yāti tryahādūrdhvaṃ pibed ghṛtam ||
nṛṇāṃ śūlaṃ prabhavati gudasraṃsaś ca dāruṇaḥ ||
sṛjecchuklaṃ sa śakṛtā kṛṣṇaṃ vā raktam eva vā |
śaraṇāni ca śītāni vāri śītaṃ ca sevate ||
srotāṃsi kupito vāyus tasya cāvṛtya tiṣṭhati |
sālo rubūkastriphalā dantī citraka eva ca |
upadravāṇām eteṣāṃ śāntir yadi na vidyate |
teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathāsvaṃ svaṃ cikitsitam ||
vamane cātiyukte tu kāryam āsthāpanaṃ bhavet |
ca secayed dhastau tathā vāpy avagāhayet ||
dhātakī madhukaṃ lodhraṃ padmaṃ mocarasas tathā |
payasā bādaraṃ drākṣāṃ madhunā ca piben naraḥ ||
rasāś ca jāṅgalā deyā vyaktā dāḍimasārakaiḥ |
saptarātraṃ sthite takre mūlakaṃ sādhayed bhiṣak |
tena mūrcchā bhramaś caiva praśāmyati śarīriṇām |

vacāṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ pūtīkāṃ pañcamūlīṃ ca sādhitām
       |
evam eva vibandhe ' pi vidhiṃ kuryāc cikitsakaḥ |
yāś ca vyāpattayaḥ paścādvamane ca virecane ||
utkleśe cordhvavāte ca duryukte vāpi bheṣaje |
bheṣajaṃ hy atimātraṃ tu jīvādānāya kalpate |
vyāpadaś ca cikitsā yā yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

bhele siddhisthāne caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
       athāto vastimātrīyāṃ

siddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |
sa gambhīro gataḥ kāye sarvaśo na nivartate ||
chardiṃ pipāsāṃ hṛdrogaṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ śvayathuṃ tathā |
janayed iha tasmād dhi viriktaṃ nānuvāsayet ||
saṃsṛṣṭabhaktasya tathā punaś ca snehitasya ca |
ekāntare ca dātavyo bastirna satataṃ nṛṇām |
triṣu vā vaidyo yāvadvā snigdhatā punaḥ ||

vastimupāsīta sa jīveccharadāṃ śatam || ity āha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |

iti bhele siddhisthāne pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭo ' dhyāyaḥ ||
       athāta
upakalpasiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
ca kriyāṃ karma ca me śṛṇu ||
tasmāt kālaṃ ca yo vyādhiṃ nirūhāṇāṃ balābalam |
yo vetti sa mohaṃ na nigacchati ||
sa nivṛttas tu vegena doṣān gambhīramāsthitān |
vastivego ' nilaṃ hanti parjanyaṃ ca yathānilaḥ |
tasmād ardhaṃ cikitsāyāḥ sarvaṃ vā vastir ucyate ||
yas tu vastiṃ niṣeveta cāturmāsyaṃ sadā naraḥ |
nirūhasyāsya sāmarthyam upacāraṃ ca me śṛṇu ||
svinne paryuṣite jīrṇe tvatyantaṃ ca nirūhayet |
so ' sya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ cāpakarṣati ||
viśodhayati tat sarvaṃ nirūhaḥ sa prayojitaḥ |
śleṣmaṇā saha saṃsṛṣṭe śoṇitena ca dūṣite ||

martyānāṃ māṃsasaṃjananaṃ smṛtam || ity āha
       bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele siddhisthāne ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ |

phalamātrāsiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ
       |
teṣāṃ tu madanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravadanti cikitsakāḥ ||
garhitā ssarva evaite vādāḥ pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
kuṣṭhaṃ ca tagaraṃ caiva yaṣṭīmadhukam eva ca |
daśamūlī karañjau dvau dantī citrakam eva ca ||
ekāṣṭhīlā turaṅgī ca triphalā devadāru ca |
guḍūcīṃ triphalāṃ śigruṃ karṇikāyāḥ phalāni ca ||
madhukaṃ śatapuṣpāṃ ca saindhavaṃ sarṣapān guḍam ||
ekena yadi vā dvābhyāṃ tribhir vātipramāṇataḥ ||
vāyuḥ kupyati śītatvād atyuṣṇaṃ tu gudaṃ dahet |
so ' lpaṃ harati doṣaṃ ca na ca saṃśodhayed gudam |
ca śūlaṃ ca janayec ca pravāhikām ||
na nirharati doṣāṃś ca jvaraṃ mūrchāṃ karoti ca ||
jvaritaṃ dahyamānaṃ ca mūrchamānaṃ ca mānavam |
pitte śīto nirūhaḥ syāduṣṇas tu kaphavātayoḥ
tadaikadhyaṃ pacet sarvaṃ jale cāṣṭaguṇe bhiṣak |
yuktaṃ tena kaṣāyeṇa ghṛtena saha yojayet |
mākṣikeṇa ca saṃyukto vastis tu yavamūrcchitaḥ ||

vikārais tu tān bhiṣak saṃprayojayet || ity āha bhagavān
       ātreyaḥ |
vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
na yujyate vā duryukto yukto vāpy atipūryate ||
purīṣeṇāvṛte vāpi sa na gāḍhaṃ prapīḍitaḥ ||
na gacchati gude vastirvibhrānteṣu ca dhātuṣu |
eṣāṃ pratyekaśo rūpaṃ cikitsāṃ ca nibodha me ||
kalkena sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pīlūnāṃ madanasya ca |
śāntiṃ puṇyāhaghoṣāṃś ca kuryāc cāpi pradakṣiṇam

nidhāya śubhe kumbhe vastiṃ dadyāt pramāṇataḥ
       |
tatra vāditraśabdāṃś ca kuryāt svastyayanāni ca |
celāvṛtaṃ ca kurvīta sādhuśabdāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ |
tato ' smin dāpayed vastiṃ puṇye ' hani rasāyanam ||

vā ' patyaṃ mṛtaṃ sūte yāś ca naṣṭārtavās
       tathā |
madanāni ca rāsnā ca bhārṅgī, nīparakajvalam(?) |
tulyaṃ madhu ca tailaṃ ca tasmād uṣṇodakaṃ samam |
akṣamātraṃ ca mustānāṃ sa vastiḥ pūrvakalpavat
yataś śataṃ vā ṣaṣṭiṃ vā nārīr gacchati mānavaḥ |
rasāyanā vastayas tu ye mayā pūrvadarśitāḥ |
